title: Lucky Money - Feel Great & Make it Rain
description:
Collect Coins and Tokens, take dream prizes. 
Tap, scratch, collect, take rewards home. Simple, fun and easy. 

 
Take some spare time, join us and be one of the winners! Download Lucky Money to collect your fortune every day. The more you play, the more rewards you can win! What are you waiting for? Get your first Lucky Money!


Lucky Money is a new, fun and rewarding lifestyle experience on your phone. We offer free scratchers and real winning experience to users. Free lotto brings you happiness. Daily raffle tests your fortune power. Lucky spin fulfills your winning expectations. Cracking eggs makes your day!

We believe that if one considers himself lucky then he will eventually be lucky in real life. So we delicately chose these gorgeous cards with pleasant colors and wonderful rewards to enhance your lucky feelings. You have every reason to feel rewarded and gather all the joy in our app. We wish you have a lucky day.

Download Lucky Money to try your luck every day. Besides the more you scratch, the more rewards you can win! What are you waiting for? Get your first Lucky Money!

*This game does not cost any real money. 
*Playing this game does not imply future success in ‚ÄúReal Money Gambling‚Äù. 
*Google Inc. does not sponsor, nor in any way affiliated with Lucky Money and/or the sweepstakes prizes.

recentChanges: Fixed bugs. Improved user experiences.
comments: I've downloaded three to four of these kinds of apps as an experiment. So far, in terms of this one, it's not only rigged but I have a feeling that it is possible to "win". Don't be fooled however, the lucky number scratch card has a locked final row, which of course you need to play an ad to unlock. Problem is, the app is telling me the video is not ready every time I tap the watch ad button This leads me to believe that I won a large payout but the app knows and wont give it to me.

I would give a 5 star if there were actually gift cards to cash out. There are only $2 and $50 cards there are NEVER any & 5 $10 or $20 available! It doesn't matter when or how often you check. It's very frustrating. Getting ready to quit scratching and just forget all the tokens I have because they are useless.... And at what time does it reset because I check at midnight... And then about every 30 minutes thereafter as I actually don't sleep..I have not been able to find a time when it resets

This is a nice app only if you like playing Lottery tickets. You will take like 2 or 3 months to earn $2 which is ridiculous it takes forever to earn any money. You earn $0.10 every month. When you first install the app you make more money and then when it's time to get closer to cash out which is $10 you stop earning money. So if you like wasting time everyday only earning pennies then this is the app for you.

Can't select my lotto numbers anymore, my username has changed, my tokens have gone from millions to thousands overnight, and even my cash went down for a day before going back up. (The tokens continue to disappear) It will show you 3-5 ads for the price of one. (I restart the app at that point, that's a seriously shady practice) It is just an untrustworthy app. Buggy and/or dishonest. I'm so close to cashing out, as soon as I do, I'm deleting this one.

What a joke. I've been playing for months now,and the money prizes are some what impossible to earn. My cash balance has been at $9.95 for 2 weeks . God forbid I make the $10 mark and this app has to pay me. I've watched probably 600 ads ,can only imagine what this app makes $ every time another company advertise. 5 cents ! That's all I need to cash out BS!

title: Lucky Day - Win Real Money
description:
Lucky Day is a 100% Free Sweepstakes App! 

Lucky Day offers free scratcher, lotto, and raffle games for a chance to win real money and rewards. With daily opportunities to win up to $100,000 in cash instantly, earn rewards, or enter raffles! 

Lucky Day is a free lifestyle experience on your mobile device. We change lives daily by offering hundreds of games for our players to scratch and have a chance to win real money instantly.

Play your free daily lotto and scratch cards for a chance to win real money and prizes. New scratch cards are available daily for your chance to win up to $10,000 instantly. You can also enter sweepstakes contests, raffle giveaways, and the daily lotto. 

Our mission is to give everyone a free chance to have a Lucky Day because we believe you shouldn‚Äôt have to risk losing for the chance to win! 

Lucky Day is 100% free to download and play with no in-app purchases or deposits. 

Lucky Day Features: 

WIN REAL MONEY
‚úî Win the jackpot prize of $100,000 by entering the daily lotto!
‚úî Win up to $10,000 by matching 3 winning symbols on the instant win scratch cards!

EARN REWARDS 
‚úî Earn gift cards from top brands including Amazon, Walmart, Dunkin Donuts, Target, etc.
‚úî Enter cool raffle giveaways to win HUGE prizes! 

ENJOY PLAYING DAILY
‚úî Enter the daily lotto and reveal the results at 7 pm PT for your chance to win!  
‚úî New scratch cards daily at 12 am PT.  
‚úî Bonus scratch cards daily at 10 am PT and 6 pm PT.  
‚úî Play Lucky Day for 5 minutes a day to test your luck and get lucky.  

Over $5 Million in cash and rewards have been awarded to Lucky Day players, and we have 30,000 new winners every week! Lucky Day brings you free scratchers, lotto, and raffle games for a chance to win cash and prizes. With thousands of real winners daily, you could be next!

Congratulations to some of our recent winners:
‚ô• Christopher E. from Albuquerque, NM who won the $1,000 Raffle in December 2018
‚ô• Luis V. from Waterbury, CT who won the $1,250 Lucky Night Scratcher in January 2019
‚ô• Jayda P. from Atlanta, GA who won the $400 Raffle in January 2019

Download Lucky Day and see if today is your lucky day!

For all the latest news and exclusive winning opportunities, make sure to Like and Follow Lucky Day on social media!
Facebook: @luckydayapp
Instagram: @luckydayapp
Twitter: @luckydayapp
For feature requests or feedback, please send us an email to support@luckydayapp.com. 

These sweepstakes are devised as non-gambling promotions and are intended solely for entertainment purposes. 

*Google Inc. does not sponsor, nor is any way affiliated with Lucky Day and/or the sweepstakes prizes.

*Lucky Day is a free mobile gaming app that allows users to win money and prizes, no purchase is necessary.

Thanks for playing Lucky Day! To improve our app for you, we bring updates to Google Play regularly.
- Improved User Experience
- Performance Improvements
- Bug Fixes
comments: So I complained about this before and I see they r back at it. There is no reason why their advertising should open anything on your phone. On the 6th straight day of playing you get to spin the wheel for money and tokens. I have been playing over a year and the only thing I have ever gotten was 8,000 tokens. With 6 spaces on the wheel your odds of just getting only 8,000 everytime. They let you get your money up to $9.75 and stop. Been waiting for a year to get .25 cents. Rigged

It's real in the sense that you can earn coins watching ads and playing scratchers to eventually get giftcards that do work (I earned a $5 Starbucks card). However, it's a huge time sink and I have yet to believe you can win cash. I've been stuck at $8.00 for more than a year, and it requires a minimum $10 to withdraw.

The idea that you can win real money and gift card rewards for a certain number of tokens accumulated sounds wonderful, but is not easy to achieve with this app. I have been using this app for at least 2 or 3 months, on a daily basis and have only one 4.00 total. You have a much better chance winning tokens so you can claim a giftcard, but the big issue there is that all of the gift cards are sold out/out of stock and have been out of stock for months. Why am I using this app again???ü§îüòíüôÑüòë

Update: finally got to my coin balance required for a gift card and, oddly enough, all the gift cards in that category were sold out! That was about a month ago and, though they say they will have them soon, they are still not there. If you click on one that does not say "sold out" and fill in the required data, it will not let you get it - suddenly it too is sold out. After originally giving them 5 stars, I've changed my mind! Fun gaming but seems like bs now.

I've played this game for months now with very little expectations. I read the reviews and dont expect to win cash ever. That's fine. But after months of play and millions of coins the game wont let me redeem them for a gift card. I find them available but I get an error message every time I try to redeem one. Any one. I back out and go back in to see if someone had gotten it before me, but it's still there only I cant redeem it. That's trash!

title: Make It Rain: The Love of Money - Fun & Addicting!
description:
Are you a fan of casual games that are so addicting they‚Äôre hard to put down? Then swipe your boredom away with Make it Rain: The Love of Money! It‚Äôs a fiendishly clever clicker game that‚Äôs super simple to pick up, hard to master, and crazy addicting to play! Swipe and watch the money pile up into the hundreds, thousands, millions, kili-billies and beyond.

Make some wise or shady investments to earn all that money ‚Äì you‚Äôre a capitalist, so act like one! Tap tap tap to get rich, establish a capitalist legacy, then kick the bucket as an old goat mega-billionaire with loads of money. Pass your money on to the next generation and let the capitalist adventure begin again!

Hit it rich or swipe to expand your fortune as you play free addicting games on Make it Rain: The Love of Money!

Make it Rain Features:

Swipe to make it rain cash and coins!
- Investment games have never been so addicting ‚Äì or free! Swipe and pile up the free money.
- Clicker game that will make you rich! Well, technically not real money... but at least you‚Äôll have piles of virtual cash each time you play this addicting game!
- Swipe as fast as you can to collect that sweet, sweet money!

Investment games that make bank!
- Investments are the ultimate step in your capitalist adventure.
- Make smart investments to earn cash even when the addicting game is closed!
- Clicker game lets you invest in venture capital, loan sharking, or offshore drilling.
- Swipe your way to millions when you start a lemonade stand, cash casino or clown college.
- Just tap tap tap to buy off a federal judge as the money continues to roll in!

Establish a capitalist legacy to get bonuses!
- Swipe, steal and cheat to your heart‚Äôs content to keep that money flowing in this frantic clicker game.
- As a capitalist, make friends in Congress or become an institutional investor to grow your fortune.
- An addicting adventure with insider trading! SHHH... don‚Äôt tell anybody. Yes, even YOU, Steve.

Pass on your cash cow when you R.I.P.
- Your capitalist legacy lives on ‚Äì Your lineage will become heroes of Wall Street with all the money you rake in.
- Pass on your cash cow to your family and snatch up tons of bonuses.
- Swipe, tap and watch your fortune grow as each family member lets the money pile up!


Oh, and be a smart cookie and buy that vault. Even a capitalist as vibrant and dashing as you can‚Äôt keep tap tap tapping forever‚Ä¶

Download Make it Rain: The Love of Money and start raking in the mega-billions! It‚Äôs as easy as 1, 2, 3!

Note:

Make it Rain: The Love of Money is free to play but does offer in-app purchases of various kinds.

Let us know what you think! Problems? Questions? Get in touch! hello@spaceinch.com

comments: Make it rain Make it rain Make it. Sure we don't let the rain get into your. Microphone for your speaker. cuz it will not hear you properly. It's very hard for it to understand you cooperatively. even though it likes to joke around doesn't want to spend all this time just hanging around. So dumb right guys, girls do humans. So again just remember when cleaning your phone to protect microphone for the Google Assistant cannot to her job. Which all she wants to do is help you all. Loves you and I

tournament mode is only accessible one time and also rob the tower does not exist, and now the legacy and shovels, the game is lame without these, if I do not see a fix in a fix bye game, could not enter tournament mode so I got ranked probably 2nd to last. I hate this game now.

I appreciate all the hard work put into this game and I really love playing Make It Rain. But you guys game is having a big bug where I am not able to play the game for very long...Like other people's experiences I open it for a minute or so and think it's working but then it tells me "Make It Rain isn't responding" then close, report bug, etc. Please fix this bug I really love this game! You guys say the bug is fixed but it's still broken. Thank you - Emily J. Hawthorne

This game is awesome - when it plays. I downloaded the game because i loved it last time I had it. Get this game, excited to play it, and it either kicks me off the app immediately when it starts loading, or lets me click in about $50 and says that the game has something wrong with it and is disabled or something. Again, great game, but please get this fixed.

I wish I could give this app 0 stars! It looks good but as soon as you start playing it crashes. Nothing loads, it tells you what to do but you can't even make it through the tutorial without the app closing 100 times. Fed up with reloading and trying to get absolutely nowhere. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME BY INSTALLING THIS APP!!!!

title: MSN Money- Stock Quotes & News
description:
Finance simplified

Know more about your money with financial data and news from the world's top sources. Grow your finances with handy tools and calculators, anytime and anywhere.

BEST DATA
Track major indexes from around the world, including NASDAQ, NYSE, Dow Jones, S&P 500, DAX, FTSE 100, NIKKEI 225 and more. Also track currency exchange rates and commodity prices.

PERSONALIZED WATCHLIST
Add your favorite stocks, mutual funds, and ETFs to your personal watchlist. Get stock quotes, charts, trends, recommendations and detailed company profiles. Sign in to save your preferences.

LATEST NEWS
Read the latest news and advice on business, finance, markets, technology, companies, small business, personal finance, saving & investing, spending & borrowing, credit, real estate, insurance, taxes, retirement, career & education, top stocks, budgeting and more from all major media sources, including Wall Street Journal (WSJ), CNBC, Reuters, Fox Business, Wall Street Journal, CNBC, Forbes, Bloomberg, Investopedia, MarketWatch, and more.  
 
FINANCIAL TOOLS
Get more from your money with financial and budgeting tools such as a mortgage calculator, currency converter, tip calculator, wealth estimator, and retirement planner.

AVAILABLE ANYWHERE
Automatically sync your watchlist across MSN Money on the web and your mobile apps for quick access to the stocks you care about.

TOP INDEXES
Track major indexes from around the world:
-	Asia-Pacific: NIKKEI 225, SENSEX, NIFTY, SHANGHAI COMPOSITE, S&P/ASX 200, HANG SENG, KOSPI, KLCI, NZSE 50, etc.
-	Americas: NASDAQ, NYSE, Dow Jones, S&P 500, RUSSELL 2000, IPC, IPSA, IBOVESPA, etc.
-	Europe: CAC 40, ATX, BEL 20, OMX COPENHAGEN 20, OMX HELINSKI 25, FTSE MIB, IBEX 35, etc.

COMMODITY PRICES
Track commodity prices: Gold, Silver, Crude Oil, Natural Gas, Cotton, Sugar, Wheat, Corn, etc.

CURRENCY EXCHANGE RATES
Track currency exchange rates: USD/ EURO, USD/ YEN, USD/ CAD, POUND/USD, USD/ YUAN, USD/ INR, USD/ FRANC (CHF), USD/ WON, USD /KRONA KR, etc.

MAJOR COMPANIES
Track Microsoft (MSFT), Google (GOOG/GOOGL), Nokia (NOK), Facebook (FB), Apple (AAPL), Twitter (TWTR), Alibaba (BABA), and more.

Some features may not be available in all markets.

Terms of Use: http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/microsoft-services-agreement

recentChanges: Bug fixes and stability improvements
comments: Full of bugs. When I remove an item from my portfolio and re-add it (so it will be at the top of the list) it says it has been added, but it's nowhere to be found! Today I signed into the Web version and tried to sync my portfolio. Well what do you know, another error! I am signed in to the app and Web version, but my watched items are not synced.

Good app with accurate information. But it could be greatly improved by adding some dynamism. 10Y data would be nice, even if it would require the user to pay a subscription. Options to calculate growth rate for specific time periods would be a cool addition. Custom alerts for the watchlist would make a lot of sense; time to buy or sell? Set your notifications according to your preference.

My watchlist has disappeard many times and is currently not appearing once again. I also get a pop up every single time I open the app saying that there were changes made and I need to merge or cancel. I never log out or try to do anything offline in the app... Without these issues the app would be a 5 star app. Its very intuitive. Edit: Was forced logged out and lost my favorites again, just going to use another app.

What happened to the mutual funds on my Watchlist?? It won't let me add them back either. And what's with the pop-up saying I have made changes while logged out of the app when I haven't logged out or made any changes? The changes were made when they dropped my funds! This used to be a good app, but no more. Come on Microsoft, get your act together.

First impressions are good.. suggestions are 1. Each stock info in the watchlist seems to take too much height...should be sale on bright with option to tap on it for more info 2. Please add the feature to reorganize the watchlist...lot of us have preferences on how we view how stockists opposed to how ot shows up here....first added goes to the bottom...

title: MISTPLAY: Gift Cards, Money, Rewards Playing Games
description:
Earn rewards and make money playing mobile games!

Mistplay pays you to play games! Discover new games in your mixlist, choose a game and start earning points! Redeem them for gift cards or for cash rewards -> visa gift cards, Amazon gift cards, Xbox gift cards, Google Play, iTunes, Nintendo, PlayStation gift cards and more.

Mistplay Highlights:

‚úì üî• Discover new games in your mixlist.

comments: This app is nice if you only intend to earn $10 to $20. This is because the more you earn, the harder it will be to earn the next $$$. Only a few games will reward you with lots of points. Most games are also garbage (typical slot games that you just idle). Honestly, considering the energy your device take, the time that you cannot use your device, and the wear on your device, it might not even be beneficial at all. Kudos to them for being legit though. I've redeemed over $20.

So far this is the best app I have tried concerning winning money and gift cards. It does take time, but all you are doing is playing games. No ads, no tricks. They even offer contests where you can win additional prizes and to enter the steps are simple; download a game and play to a certain level. They add new games for downloads all the time. The only 2 things I would like to see is an Amazn gift card for $20 or $25 and the addition of word search games to choose from.

I play every day and twice now it has taken 25 units off of me which is 50 units in total and claimed I have not carried on the streak when I know I have because I have never missed a day in over 200 days. I get daily rewards on my games yet mistplay claims I have not???! A big con to stop you gaining too many units so they don't lose too much when you cash them in!! Fed up with this game now.

I only downloaded this to work in conjunction with Rise Of Kingdoms. It would be very helpful to install a search capability so players can quickly search for their game rather than scroll through 100 irrelevant ones.. yikes. The online article that referred me to this app gave every indication this is normal use of the app but I can't find the game anywhere on the apps choice of games. Frustrating. Guess the only choice is to uninstall it.

I've had my daily streak reset twice after using the app and playing games through it more than once a day. Also, the apps that give you any amount of points that will eventually add up to a free gift card, are either really hard to run for a mid tier phone or just slot machine games. Get some better games and fix your daily streak. Afk arena is kinda cool.

comments: Funny, when I first started playing this I accumulated $10 plus so tried to cash out only to be told you had to get $40 before you could. So I carried on playing and got to $45+ and tried again, guess what, now I'm told I need $50 before cash out so I keep on playing and playing and etc. and I have not even had 2 cents in the last month. That cannot be bad luck - just you don't want to pay out anybody! Comment on that if you dare!!!

Moved the goal post, I have been playing this for several months, I had to get to $40 to cash out, you won all the time at first but as the same as every other app I have played, the winning slowed down and got less and less, now I win 2 cents ( sorry I deal with ¬£) , then along came the update now the cash out limit is $50, based on the other reviews I don't think this app is going to pay out. If that is the case , false advertising, sure that's breaking the law . We will see

This game really does get you money in coins. It is hella easy to get the coins to 10k mil. Which you get only $1 from that. Really does send it to your paypal and all. The only thing I find an issue is after you cash out 1-3 times. It becomes slower, winning even change takes forever/not at all anymore. So getting to $50 is a hassle. Once they fix that or i can cash my $50 out, I'll change my rating to 5 stars. But yes I would refer as many people as possible to play. It's actually fun.

This is the 2nd new version,,,x,,and nothing changes with the game! Except my phone doesn't always let me download the new version without me having to take out one of my other games so I can get the new version. It doesn't seem worth it to me. Not even winning that much money or anything else.Here we go again with your update,,,,,,,it takes my GB,,,,,,,,,,,And just when I'm sooo close to my pay-out! HOW CONVENIENT,,,,,DON'T YOU THINK?????? WHY is another update necessary after only 2 d

Was fun at first. Money added up quick until I hit $34.28 You can't cash out until you hit $40. I have only earned 2 cents in the last 3 months. They won't let you get $40. As for coins it takes forever to save enough to get anything with them. Still playing but don't recommend. Now it says I have $45 and I need $50 to cash out. It keeps going up.

title: AdVenture Capitalist
description:
Play the world‚Äôs greatest money making idle game! Ever dreamed of owning your own business? Being the master of your own destiny? Becoming a capitalist tycoon? Do you just dream about money, money and MONEY, even when you sleep? Then AdVenture Capitalist is the idle clicker for YOU! 

FROM RAGS TO RICHES
Start from the humble roots of running a lone lemonade stand to becoming the CEO of a cash printing, money making multinational conglomerate. 

SPECULATE TO ACCUMULATE
Sick of clicking buttons? Expand your capitalist empire when you hire managers to automate and boost your profits. The only way to go is UP UP UP!

DRESS UP LIKE A MILLION DOLLAR TROOPER
Deck out your Capitalist in custom outfits and accessories that not only look super duper, but also boost your businesses.  

INVEST YOUR WAY TO SUCCESS
Attract eager Angel Investors to amplify your money-making potential. Each angel earns you a boost to your profits. Every penny counts!

JOIN THE SPACE RACE!
Unlock AdVentures to the Moon and Mars and discover new investments, upgrades, managers, and items in space. 

BE THE LIFE OF THE PARTY
Need a break from your regular capitalist programming? Join our weekly events and earn Gold, Megabucks, and exclusive badges. Earn more by ranking high in our Event Leaderboards! 

WATCH THE NUMBERS ROLL IN
Get on with your day and make money while you eat, drink, or sleep. It‚Äôs impossible to lose when you live the idle dream! 

Your AdVenture of a lifetime starts today! 
---------------------------------------------------------------

But don‚Äôt just take it from us ‚Äî here‚Äôs what your fellow investors have to say:

‚ÄúAdVenture Capitalist exudes a campy self-awareness of capitalism‚Äôs most obvious flaws while simultaneously encouraging total indulgence in them.‚Äù - The Washington Post

‚ÄúMathematics plus economics all in one.‚Äù - GeekDad
---------------------------------------------------------------

Having problems or want to share a great idea? We would love to hear from you! 
http://bit.ly/AdCapSupport or contact us in game by clicking Menu > Connect > Help & FAQ

Visit us at: https://screenzilla.com/adventure-capitalist-mobile/
Like us on: https://www.facebook.com/AdCapHH/
Follow us at: https://twitter.com/AdVenture_CapHH
Instastalk us at: https://www.instagram.com/adventurecapitalist_hh/ 


AdVenture Capitalist is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings. 

Playing AdVenture Capitalist requires an internet connection. AdVenture Capitalist includes advertising for third parties, some of which may be targeted to your interests. You may choose to control targeted advertising by using your mobile device settings (e.g. by re-setting your device‚Äôs advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest based ads). 

Terms of Use: https://screenzilla.com/terms-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://screenzilla.com/privacy-policy/

comments: Fun game, I really use to like it. I tried to play again. But I can't stand the portait mode. Saw some comment about changing UI or something from about 2 months ago. But still no landscape mode. Hope you guys put it back in the game. It was so much easier to get arround with the landscape mode. Hope you guys bring it back because having to scroll everytime is awfull.

It's gotten to f******* annoying that ads won't close and click down another -50 secs. Game forces you to Google play for download purchases. Glad my account isn't set up with my bank card! High jacker malware! For someone who wins more events in a row, you guys are about to lose a paying customer! Fix this or lose money. They are tons of other games out there that can comply with customers. Wake up!

Good game but can you make connection vaults unlockable with megabucks instead of gold? I calculated and using 10 gold per mini vault means spending at least 7200 gold which will take me 6 years of playing events to get the gold needed if I spend all gold I earn on vaults. Please change the currency needed to open vaults to megabucks because there is no use of megabucks right now besides mini boost chests which are useless. If you change this, I will rate 5 stars.

Welp, after I won my first event with over 220,000 points with only using 10 3 hour warps, I started this one with a bang and purchased the x28 bonus for $12, and It completely screwed me. I was able to purchase all upgrades quickly, but now my goals are 100% unreachable without copious amounts of time warps. I get how it works, but was surprised by the absolute lack of stretch goals and money/angel upgrades.. Definitely won't be purchasing that ever again.

This game is just borderline UNPLAYABLE on my device. Whenever I try to buy an Oil Industry, for example, the game chrasbes shortly after purchasing it. I used be able to enjoy this game with no problem but after these newer updates, it's proven that you need a lot of big fixing to do still. Uninstalling.

title: Cash App
description:
Cash App is the easiest way to send, spend, save, and invest your money. It‚Äôs the SAFE, FAST, and FREE money app.

SAFE: Protect all of your payments with a passcode. Pause spending on your Cash Card with one tap if you misplace it.

FAST: Sign up and make your first payment in minutes. Instantly send and receive money from friends. Cash out from Cash App to your bank account instantly instead of waiting days. 

FREE: Send and receive money at no cost. Get a completely free virtual Visa debit card in minutes, and we‚Äôll mail you your custom physical debit card for free in under a week.

Here‚Äôs how it works:

* SIGN UP IN SECONDS *
It only takes a couple of minutes to download and sign up for Cash App. The signup process is simple and fast so that you can start using Cash App as quickly as possible.

* SEND AND RECEIVE CASH INSTANTLY * 
Send, receive, and request cash from friends and family instantly with only a few taps. Cash App is the easiest way to pay a friend back for dinner or chip in on rent with your roommates. 

* CUSTOM VISA DEBIT CARD *
Order your Cash Card (a customizable Visa debit card) directly from Cash App. You‚Äôll instantly be able to make online purchases or add your Cash Card to Google Pay for in-store purchases. Of course, we‚Äôll also mail you your Cash Card in less than a week so you can use it to pay anywhere.  

* INSTANT DISCOUNTS *
Cash Card is the only free debit card with instant discounts at your favorite stores and restaurants. These instant discounts - Boosts - are easy to use and are applied to Cash Card transactions instantly. Just select a given Boost in your app and then use your Cash Card to pay. It‚Äôs that simple. No points, no waiting, just instant savings.

* BITCOIN * 
Cash App is the easiest way to buy, sell, deposit, and send Bitcoin. Track the BTC price in realtime in your app and buy as little as $1 of Bitcoin. Your BTC arrives in your app instantly and you can keep it safe in Cash App or choose to withdraw it.

* STOCKS * 
Instantly begin investing commission-free with Cash App. You can buy as little as $1 of stock in top US companies. Track stock prices in realtime in your app and monitor the performance of your overall investment portfolio. Create a list of companies to follow so you can stay up to date on performance. Brokerage services provided by Cash App Investing LLC, member FINRA / SIPC. Investing involves risk; you may lose money.

* PAYCHECK DEPOSIT *
Get your paycheck deposited directly into Cash App. Instantly receive a personal account and routing number that lets you or your employer make deposits into your Cash App via traditional ACH transactions.

recentChanges: Various bug fixes and improvements
comments: I used cash app in the past and I loved it, it made my life easier in a few different ways such as paying bills online, shopping online, sending money to my son and receiving money from my friends and family. I received my new card in the mail yesterday and have been trying for hours to activate it and it won't let me!! It's keeps saying" something went wrong please try again in a few minutes" I have $$$ I need to pay a bill and I'm furious and nobody has replied to my email): and I am stressed

So frustrating!! I wanted to see what all the hipe is about. I usually just use paypal, but people have talked me into trying something new, Cash app. Everytime I try to add cash from my bank account I keep getting a "transaction failed" message. I know that my information is correct because I was able to see my bank account balance through the cash app. I sent a email still waiting on feedback.

I have both sent and received payments that have not been added/deducted from my account with no support to locate the missing funds. The "support" consists of a message asking if your email address or phone number has changed and if that's not the case there's no other options given. I'm out of over $200 and no support.

Change the way instant deposit works. It's inconvenient as is. My roommates cashapp me their part of the bill's every month and it's annoying that your 1.5% fee is put on the exact amount you are trying to get. For example, rent is $1,295. Divided 3 ways is $431.67 and 1.5% of that is $6.48, so you'd think, okay, add $6.48 to $431.67 to cover the fee, BUT doing so brings the amount to $438.15, SO 1.5% of that is $6.57. So now they'll be short by $0.09 cents. It's too much math. Separate the fee.

Not a good app at all. Surprising coming from a company like Square. People describe it as being so user-friendly, however I haven't been able to get it to work yet (and thi is coming from someone incredibly tech savvy). Install the app, fill out some information, attach a bank account--done. Try to add cash to the account, transaction fails everytime. Head to the Bitcoin page, because why not (I might buy into bitcoin eventually). You have to apply/request access to withdrawals/deposits where it will ask you for all sorts of information about yourself, as well as a pic (front/back) of your ID and a mugshot of yours truly. Done. Wait a day and get an email saying you weren't approved. However, the withdrawal/deposit options pop up within the app. Of course, you can't do anything with them because you need cash in the cash app to buy into any Bitcoin. Which of course, transferring any cash in is impossible. You reach out to them via email, and they just respond back that "if you're having trouble uploading images" (which I wasn't as I uploaded them just fine), to upload them to some 3rd party upload service (ID or passport, and a pic of you holding...that last part was never asked for by the app). So now you are sending your personal information all over the place if you choose to comply. The email doesn't describe what is wrong with the app or why nothing has worked thus far. Simple usage and deposits of cash into the app didn't require the documents/images. If the issue is simply getting this to work, why are we jumping through so many loops and sending our personal information all over the place. It feels incredibly shady and I can't recommend this app. Go elsewhere.

title: Money Manager Expense & Budget
description:
Money Manager - the #1 financial planning, review, expense tracking, and personal asset management app for Android!

Money Manager makes managing personal finances as easy as pie! Now easily record your personal and business financial transactions, generate spending reports, review your daily, weekly and monthly financial data and manage your assets with Money Manager's spending tracker and budget planner.

* Applying double entry bookkeeping accounting system
Money Manager facilitates efficient asset management and accounting. It does not just record your money coming in and out of your account but deposits your money into your account as soon as your income is input and draws money from your account as soon as your expense is input.

* Budget and expense management function 
Money Manager shows your budget and expenses by a graph so you can see the amount of your expense against your budget quickly and make suitable financial inferences

* Credit / Debit Card management function 
Entering a settlement date, you can see the payment amount and outstanding payment at the asset tab. You can arrange the automatic debit by simply connecting your debit card with your account.

* Passcode 
You can check passcode so you can safely manage your financial review account book with Money Manager

* Transfer, direct debit and recurrence function 
Transfer between assets is possible, which makes your personal and business asset management more efficient. In addition, you can manage you a salary, insurance, term deposit and loan more easily by setting automatic transfer and recurrence.

* Instant statistics 
Based on the data entered, you can instantly see your expense by category and changes between each month. And you can see the change of your assets and income/expense indicated by a graph as well.

* Bookmark function 
You can easily input your frequent expenses all at once by bookmarking them.

* Backup / Restore
You can make and view backup files in Excel file and backup/restore is possible.

* Other functions
- Change of starting date
- Calculator function (Amount > upper right button)
- Sub Category ON-OFF function

* Paid version *
- No Ads.
- Unlimited Assets (In the free version, limited to 10.)
- Edit PC (http://youtu.be/5S4S3EQ3AZE)

You can view ‚Äò‚ÄúMoney Manager‚Äù application using Wi-Fi. You can edit and sort the data by date, category or account group on the screen of your PC. In addition, you can see fluctuations of your accounts indicated on graphs on your PC.

So, what are you waiting for? Download Money Money right now and start managing, tracking, and planning your budget, expenses and personal finances!

comments: I'm using it more than a year.. So far it's too good to track my transactions. Accounts management, charts, filters all good. But I have a concern. On the investment options need to add an option for interest. If I transferred the amount(with interest) from investment, it's showing the excess amount as liability.

Works well on Android 8. Comprehensive account management and transaction types. I do a lot of transactions dealing in foreign currency tho, I wish it were possible to specify the exchange rate at which each transaction was conducted. Also, the PC manager doesn't work at all for me. And the video showing a demo is from 2013.

This app is wonderful if you want to track your expense diligently, you can set a budget, create a lot of categories and subcategories. It really made me be conscious of how i spend my money and focus on more important/valuable expenses. So far, i love it!! Thanks to the developers for this app!!

Great app, probably best money/budget manager for android, however there's lack of few quite basic functions that it should have, like: - when entering new expense/transfer etc. option to enter amount in two currencies, because right now it forces to go to settings and change exchange rate before each entry that is multi currency (when you pay in a currency different that the account/card currency). - really basic thing, quite strange it does not have such option: a-z sorting for categories - another so basic thing that almost all similar apps have it: option to search category by starting typing letters that are in that category, not start but are even in the middle.

Every thing is great. Only issue is there is no share option to share the details or data. Developers Please add share option which will help us lot. Thanks ***After response received from devloper*** I asked for sharing option but there is nothing mentioned regarding share option. Request u please include share option for every page so that it can be share with others. Thanks

comments: Too many ads. There's an ad after every board! And they're *long* (30 seconds usually). It takes less than 2 seconds to scratch a board. Playing this game is 90%+ of ads. It's an overload.

I might not continue to use this app.

Only played for 10 minutes will see apparently you only get one payout then only tickets to be won. Well one card for one ad is an excessive amount in my world do not have time in a day to scratch all the ticket. Will see how it goes may have to delete

Was ok when first downloaded it. Was getting dollar scratchers but now it's toy scratch one then ad scratch one then ad. Spend more time watching ads than playing the game. This app is deceitful and you spend very precious time watching ads whether you want to or not. You keep playing hoping the more you play the less ads you have to watch, but no, it just gets worse. title: Money Lover: Money Manager, Budget Expense Tracker
description:
‚òÖ Best of 2017 Android App
‚òÖ Google Top Developer
‚òÖ Editors' Choice App since 2016

Money Lover was developed by a group of millennials to first solve their personal finance issues. After earning and spending almost all of our first salaries, we realized that there needed to be a convenient tool to see where our money was going and how we can spend it better.

Thus Money Lover was born - made by young professionals and for young professionals.

KEY FEATURES

‚úî Money Manager: Track expenses and incomes by categories (food, fuel, etc.).
‚úî Budget Planner: Set a limit on how much to spend in a category; get alerted when close to limit. 
‚úî Goal Wallet: Set a saving goal; automatically update your balances as you progress towards your goal
‚úî Reporting: Financial reports give you overview of your spending, income by date or group. 
‚úî Linked Wallet: Connect with bank accounts and get automatic bank feed. Security: Data encrypted by RSA-1024 bit; support PIN code & Fingerprint to unlock. 
‚úî Credit Wallet: Manage credit cards and get reminded when repayments are due

Note: We support 17 countries. Please go to Connect to bank and check the availability.


With Premium account, you have:

‚úî Unlimited number of budgets, savings, wallets, events. 
‚úî Export to CSV, Excel 
‚úî Picture attachment
‚úî Ad-free

--
Clarification for Access Permissions:
- Network Communication (Internet Access) is for syncing data and getting money exchange rate. 
- Social Information (Read Contact) is for suggesting ‚ÄúWith Who‚Äù to tag your people in your contact list.
- Your Location is for identifying your location of the transaction.
- Storage (modify or delete contents on your USB storage) is for creating and storing backup data to the USB storage.

comments: It's great app that has all of functions that I want. I'm happy with it and have been using it for a couple of years. But there're some bugs along the way of usage. Eg. App delayed synchronizing with my bank account and eventually stopped synchronzing, sometimes when I tried to edit my wallets the app pulled me back to the previous menu. And there's one time weired incident which is the most frustrating one is all of my records had gone away which I'm not sure whether I did something wrong.

I don't know what the issue is, I can sign in but the first sync always failed. 'unfortunately, we are unable to fully download your data. please try again later.' Need to several trial of sign in to success. Then after minutes using it suddenly I signed out and need to sign in again. And the issue repeat. I plan to try this app because there's interesting feature such as web sync. But I think I'll stick with my app that I havd been using for now because of this issue

Better than others.... Debt manager is one unique feature.... But, one DRAWBACK is when I add transaction as transfer from x acc y acc, tha transfered amount is considered as EXPENSE in x acc... And due to which it shows monthly expense higher by including all transfer amount... In case this will be fixed, then this is the best app to track daily, monthly expenses.... Because of that one drawback I left this app.

I paid for a premium user. Now I have problem with App synchronisation. Most data recorded was mixed up and all of the sudden it it was all gone. Okay, I decide to adjust the balance again to start over again but.....again the App start synchronizing again. Can you please fix this problem. It's so annoying! I have paid for this.

From a premium users view: For the amount you pay the app looks outdated, No materialistic design, Not enough icons to choose from, No dark mode, Looks dull. Important features that's missing: * When expenses is added to 'A' wallet & later u want to move it to 'B' wallet that not possible. * Credit cards are considered completely separate from the main wallet. This should not be it because at the end of the day. Credit card bill is payed from the main wallet. With correction it's a 5* app

title: Venmo
description:
Why use Venmo?

Because it‚Äôs the money app for splitting the cost of almost anything‚Äîright then, right there.
Because it makes settling up feel like catching up. 
Because you can add a note to each payment to remember the moments, not the money. 

What do people use Venmo for? Plenty of things, like:

Meals
Split the group dinner tab without the napkin math.

Rent
Transfer money to roomies for your share of rent and utilities.

Activities
Settle up for fun stuff like concert tix and road trips.

Surprises
Send a penny to say hi, or 5 bucks for good luck.

Still reading? We‚Äôll let you in on a little secret: we‚Äôre more than just a way to pay friends.
- We offer Venmo card, so you can shop with your Venmo balance everywhere Mastercard¬Æ is accepted in the U.S., plus earn cash back rewards at select retailers. Terms apply: https://venmo.com/rewards/
- Get your Venmo money in the bank, fast. Use Instant Transfer to get your cash in minutes using an eligible debit card or bank account. 
- Check out with Venmo on some of your favorite apps, like Uber, StockX, Grubhub, and Zola. 
- We‚Äôve got your back‚Äîsecurity is very important to us, and we prioritize making you feel safe and secure by taking security measures to protect your account. Plus, we‚Äôve got a stellar customer support team, ready to solve any issues.


Card is issued by The Bancorp Bank pursuant to license by Mastercard International Incorporated. The Bancorp Bank; Member FDIC. Mastercard is a registered trademark, and the circles design is a trademark of Mastercard International Incorporated.

recentChanges: Animated stickers are here! Enhance your payment notes with animated stickers from Holler
comments: This app is terrible. Their security is awful. Their response on trouble tickets is even worse. It also leaves you hanging to where you don't know if they even got your message. They can't do anything right. A couple months after I listed the comments above I tried to request funds from somebody and instead venmo sent them funds putting my account in the negative. I can not warn you enough, so not use this app it's terrible.

I like the ease and convenience of using the Venmo app and the Venmo card. I do have a few improvement suggestions: 1) It would be nice to get a notification in the app confirming others received $, similar to when one uses it as a Mastercard (other than the recipient responding if they feel like it.) 2) There needs to be a better was to recall money accidently sent to the wrong person. 3) It takes too many days to transfer money to and from bank accounts.

Needs to have: 1. More than one person should be able to use the same bank account, like a husband and wife with a shared account. 2 An option to verify the identify of the recepient - like sending a real-time ping or something. Last 4 digits of the phone number are okay, but wouldn't a real time ping verification be easier, especially for retail transactions?

This has been a lifesaver more than once, it's particularly a great app if you needed money in your bank account right now it's great!. That was then, this is now.it keeps telling me that my debit card can't be used for instant transfers. it worked fine with Wells Fargo but when I switch to chase now it's giving me misery up the ass.

This is the most useless app I have on my phone. When I first used it, it worked fine, but after the 3rd time of using it, it no longer would transfer my funds. Called card company, no problem there. Called venmo. they say I have to try again later or its a security reason. they cannot tell me what would cause the problem or can not lift the security restriction. STILL AFTER THIS, wanted to give it benifit, so ordered card. Now there's a "bug" in the system and cannot activated. Waited a month.

title: Cash, Inc. Money Clicker Game & Business Adventure
description:
Embark on the ultimate idle clicker adventure of a lifetime with Cash, Inc.! You can build a time machine and be the most popular money tycoon of all time (literally!). Once the wealth starts rolling in, there‚Äôs no saying how far you will go!

This tapping game was made for you, Boss! Click and tap just for a little while. Then, let amazing superstars take your business game to the next level, as they will collect your riches in your place! Become a money-crazed business tycoon as you see your riches grow in all eras.

What are you waiting for, Boss? Hop on, leap and prance through time and grow your own business empire!

Cash, Inc. Features:

MONEY CLICKER THAT MAKES YOU RICH
‚Ä¢ Live like a business tycoon, where tapping will be your greatest asset! 
‚Ä¢ Tap whenever, wherever you want, and take a break. This idle clicker lets you profit from your businesses without actually being there!
‚Ä¢ Use your earnings from tapping (as well as from your managers) to upgrade various businesses.
‚Ä¢ Make money and pile up profit so you can spend your money on what YOU want.

BUSINESS TYCOON AMENITIES
‚Ä¢ Lead a lazy, yet productive idle tycoon lifestyle while your celebrity business partners take care of you and your businesses!
‚Ä¢ Just click and tap to upgrade your businesses and keep the money flowing!
‚Ä¢ Make money while you renovate your business tower. More money means having better and more stunning tower appearances!
‚Ä¢ Let your luck come to play ‚Äì receive special free gifts like tickets, crystals and time jump with the wheel of fortune to build your wealth even more! Spin 'N Win, Boss!

WEALTHIEST OF ALL TIME!
‚Ä¢ Hire mad scientist to build a time machine, and be the richest time-travelling tycoon of all-time!
‚Ä¢ Leap through time and start your money kingdom wherever and whenever you go!
‚Ä¢ Be the most famous money tycoon on all eras and let them talk about your success in reaching fame and fortune: an empire of your own!

SHARE YOUR WEALTH

‚Ä¢ Brag about your cold hard-earned cash to fellow business tycoons on social media!

Start your own business adventure and live the life you‚Äôve always wanted. You‚Äôre just a click and a tap away from rising to fame and raking in that sweet cash!

Disclaimer: Playing Cash, Inc. requires a secure internet connection. 

P.S. Got problems? Questions? Suggestions?
We‚Äôre ready to assist you, Boss! Talk to us via cashinc@alegrium.com & join our community of businesspeople in fb.me/cashincthegame

comments: An amazing game. It really shows the lifestyle of a business owner in a funny and playful way! The only time you get ads is when you want to earn money or money multipliers. The ads benefit you and your businesses, and the ads are fairly short. Paperairplanes and other flying vehicles that give you money dont require ads to click. The game has many things you are able to do like buying businesses, buying managers, spinning wheels, buying multipliers, buying new hotels, buying fame upgrades, etc.

I like this game but on the form where you fill it in and get 15 diamonds you have to put in your name,age,where you live and your Email some of the the people that play are kids including me and you can do the form as many times as you want so you might be able to get more than 15 I don't know I haven't received the 15 diamonds yet. and also when the people appear on your screen and say I its not just a present it's medicine you have to watch the video to improve the game put yes/no buttons.

I love the game! it is THE BEST to play if you are bored. Give the game a try! You wont regret it! Also easy to play and is a great time killer. I dont know why people complain about ads because i never get them unless im getting a boost or something. Anyway, try this game, its very fun.

TOO MANY ADS. The game used to be a lot of fun and I'd spend hours playing it, but then life happened and it's been a few years since I played. I went back to play it today and there's too many unskippable ads. I can't make more than a few taps or even upgrade my prestige because it's literally an ad every 30 seconds. The worst thing about the ads is that it crashes my tablet every time! Uninstalling after 5 minutes

The game is fun, but there are too many unskippable ads. This game also has the standard optional ads that you can watch for 'free' boosts or chests and those are balanced. The ones that pop up in the middle of gameplay do so about every two minutes, and you can't opt out.

comments: App needs updated and linked to log in information online. I can get on PayPal just fine on my computer, but won't let me in through the app at all. I can't use PayPal app at all because log in information isn't the same. It's all old information, phone number, credit card, security questions. How is it convenient when it's not? Not at all!!

The app has been completely useless to me I made an account and set it up. With my ID and bank card and then I lost my bank card before they could confirm it was mine. I've been unable to update or change my card info ever since; it's been several months and they're tech support has failed to reach back out to me several times. At this point I'm just gonna close my account.

The app is great but not that great. I have been using PayPal to send money and to receive money. But I found it very difficult to transfer money from my PayPal to my local bank account. I use instant transfer button but each time I link my MasterCard to do the instant transfer,it will read your card is linked but is not eligible for instant transfer why please. I'm from Nigeria. The two star I give is for the two work PayPal is doing, sending and receiving cash.

Can never use the app, every time after logging in, and entering code for 2FA, it goes to a blank screen with a X in the upper left corner. If I click the X, I have to login again and do 2FA code again, and then back to the blank screen. If I reinstall the app, it works maybe one time before doing the blank page thing again. I can get get into the app. It's been like this for months now. Nothing seems to ever really fix this issue, and many others seeing the same issue. Please fix this!

I use PayPal for direct deposit from work, and I love it more than any bank I've ever been with. I have a card I can use anywhere in person or online, and the balance on the app is immediately updated so i always know exactly what's in my account. I'm also provided with a detailed list of what & when my expenses were. And money can be sent immediately to other paypal users. No waiting or fees. You can even create savings accounts or money pools. This is an incredible app & i adore paypal.üñ§

comments: Like any other "earn real cash" apps it will take time and patience to cash out. However, there is very little involved in earning points and it is a very unobtrusive app compared to most. Simply open app once daily to receive 10 points no strings attached. If you choose to do so, you may use their scratch cards (you get 3 every 3 hours). There will be one or two ads that must be watched during this time, especially if you did happen to earn a couple points. Overall, very easy app!

"No Ads. Try again later!" A week+ later and I still have not been able to watch a single ad despite updating the app. I can get advertisement ads constantly but not one for points? I have not reached the 1300 ad limit either so I'm not sure why I can't watch them. It's a bit frustrating because I hardly get any new offers for points and none of the web page offers work. At this point the ads were the only way to earn anything, mind you 1 point per ad, and the limit is cut off way before 1300.

My e-mail address is not working so I can't send in the form because I didn't get my points. I used it already now it's saying not valid. I have contacted support several times and no response. After I write this I'll try support again. Update 1, they gave me the missing points. My originally rating was a 1 and I changed it to 3.

As for now I'm giving 3 stars because I like this app a lot more than the others because of the OPTION to watch the ads instead of them just popping up at any time. Just downloaded last night and already doubled my points. I just turn on the ads and put my phone down and rack up points! I will update my review in 30days after I research the app a little more.

Do not hesitate to get this app, it actually gives you the money, no joke. The customer experience when I was getting my gift card was great, so that is a positive. One complaint you may have while using this app is you get a lot of points on the first day, and then it's a lot harder, but think about it. They can't be giving out free gift cards to everyone every 5 seconds. So I'll give that a pass. Great app, you should definitely try it out!

comments: What a piece of garbage. The map doesn't work. If you try to find an ATM it just Zooms in and out and moves on you can't find an ATM for anything another reason the card sucks in general. Also the app does not keep me logged in and continuously wants me to enter a verification code from my email which is f****** retarded

Awful. They can't even keep our accounts safe. Many users in my area have been suffering from money loss due to their negligence, and the only thing they offer is "10 to 15 business days" before they will do anything. They will also demand to cancel your card so you can wait to actually access your upcoming check while you sit around for 10 to 15 business days hiping to get your new card. Ridiculous...

Work Customer Service & bank out there I tried calling 6 separate times on 6 different days to get a new card. Each time they "cant verify my account" and we just go in circles. They ask the same questions 25 times like example MY NAME. The app is trash and you cannot see your account number or access anything from it. The website is even worse than the app. Dont waste your time & money on these idiots.

It was good now it's just okay the reason I say this is because every time I am trying to lock my card it keeps saying that this feature is unavailable for your account but before and many years ago I was able to lock my card and unlock it just fine now I have to call customer service every time to lock my card and to unlock it
Have been using this app for 5 plus yrs. Never had a problem. Able to lock my card when I misplace it. Also the piggy bank option is great.

comments: I will be reporting this app as false and fraud. You spend a LOT of time to reach the minimal payout and then all cards are out of stock and they have not been refilled in months. I posted this review last night and it magically vanished! There are 3x as many ads as other similar games as well. What a huge let down! I figured a game that required so much time and dedication surely should be legit. I will be notifying the companies the ads are for as well.

DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!! I've played it for over 4 months, accumulated over 20 usd. All the gift cards range from 10 usd to 100 usd, and they're all sold out. I kept playing, because it said to come back soon to see what gift cards would be available to redeem. Now it doesn't even say that anymore. App is a rip off and a waste of time. I do recommend an app called Lucky Time. This one works and they do pay money to your PayPal account.

I'm giving it a 3 star rating right now because it's a fun game but the gift cards are always sold out! I just got enough for a $10 gift card and I cant get it! Fix this please! And other thing, the bingo game is not really bingo, they should only call numbers once, not 2 or 3 times! I get so close to winning and then the same number is called and someone else wins. *update, I got my gift card in the mail but they took $3 fee for sending it, kinda a ripoff

I've had enough to cash out for 2 weeks but there are never any rewards available, the are ALL "sold out". I've checked multiple times a day, all hours of the day and night, for the past 2 weeks and the rewards still haven't been replenished! I like playing the games, but until they make the rewards available, I give it a 1üåü! I cashed out successfully before it was under construction, and you could only cash out with money, not convert stars to money! Please replenish rewards!

The games are fun but I agree with others who have posted here. I have played all scratchers, never one more than the initial dollar for new players but have won millions of stars. Faired better in the Lottery and Bingo sections. I am frustrated that my patience has been met with nothing but disappointed. It makes you wonder if any of the gift cards are EVER available. Lesson learned, there is ALWAYS a catch. Don't waste your time with this one!

comments: Honestly you do get money. I played enough just to see what happens. I saved up the coins and got the $5 amazon gift card. Now for the money you win...you will get roughly $8 free upfront and then it like a brick wall after that. After a couple months I got to $9.60 and it hasn't moved and of course the cash out limit is $10. So from a coding perspective this seems to have some sort of cap that slows winnings around the $9 mark. You can make money but good luck.

Fun to play. Lots of ways to earn points, but lots of wasted time when you can't use them. Have a hard time sometimes getting videos to play without having to click on them multiple times until I finally stop getting the loading... video error. Sometimes it takes awhile to refill the better gift cards for point redemption, but they get there. It's free, I don't expect perfection. And I've already earned a couple of Amazon gift cards, which is awesome.

I mean its obvious if you continue to use it you'll get more coins and rarely money, but the tokens get harder to build over time as you gain more. Not to mention the $5 for 5 million tokens and $10 for 10 million tokens are always unavailable once you get closer or are at the amount you need for them. The $2 is always available but 3 million tokens for it seems unmatched and unnecessary to me. It's nice for something to pass time but using it in the hopes to get money is delusional.

I have been playing this game for over a month, multiple times a day, and have yet to win even 10 cents. Waste of time. Hours of my life gone to stupid ads. The quiz game might be it's only redeeming quality, yet the logos and images to guess are never changed. It cycles through the same images. I have them all memorized now. Just don't even waste your time.

I've been playing this game off and on for about 4 months now...and recently cashed out two $2 amazon gift cards. I received them less than a week later, so it does pay out to a degree. I have no idea about getting cash from this app, but something is better than nothing, right? It does have fewer ads than several other similar scratch card type apps I've tried out, so I may stick with this one to try to earn more amazon cards.

PAY THE WAY YOU WANT
Your T-Mobile MONEY account includes a debit card with EMV chip, plus it works with Google Pay and Samsung Pay. 

HASSLE-FREE MOBILE BANKING
Easily transfer money to and from your external accounts. Send a check, pay bills, or direct deposit a portion or all of your paycheck to your account ‚Äì all with just a few taps in your T-Mobile MONEY app. 

STAY CONNECTED TO YOUR MONEY
Access your money anytime with the app and enjoy 24/7 customer support.

SAFE & SECURE
Prevent unauthorized account access with multi-factor authentication and log in with Fingerprint Scanner. Enable or disable your debit card remotely if it‚Äôs lost or stolen. Accounts are FDIC-insured up to $250,000. Plus, with Zero Liability Protection from Mastercard¬Æ you‚Äôre protected when fraud occurs. 

------------------------------------------------------------
*How APY works and what it means for you: As a T-Mobile MONEY customer you earn 4.00% annual percentage yield (APY) on balances up to and including $3,000 in your Checking account each calendar month when: 1) you are enrolled in a qualifying T-Mobile wireless plan; 2) you have registered for perks with your T-Mobile ID; and 3) you have deposited at least $200 in qualifying deposits to your Checking account within the current calendar month. Promotional deposits are not eligible toward the $200 in deposits. If you meet this deposit requirement in a given month we will pay you this benefit in the subsequent month as an added value provided all other requirements are met. This added value is subject to change. Balances above $3,000 in the Checking account earn 1.00% APY. The APY for this tier will range from 4.00% to 2.79% depending on the balance in the account (calculation based on a $5,000 average daily balance). Customers who do not qualify for the 4.00% APY will earn 1.00% APY on all Checking account balances for any month(s) in which they do not meet the requirements listed above. APYs are accurate as of 1/29/20, but may change at any time at our discretion. Fees may reduce earnings. For more information, see Account Disclosures / Terms and Conditions or go to our FAQs.

comments: Still having intermittent issues where the app doesn't recognize my fingerprint and then forces me to reset my password because it says that's wrong as well. Only thing I can do that works is reset my password. This happens about every 20 uses üò¢ Update 3/19/2020 - app has definitely improved in this regard and I am not having to reset my password anymore. Not experiencing any issues at the moment, so I am increasing my rating to 5 stars üòÉ

Nice monthly interest! The accounts are new and have some limitations (no joint accounts/additional authorized card users, no cash deposits without money order, no physical bank). However, I enjoy the wonderful effort that T-Mobile has taken to revise our current banking system. Nothing quite changes the world we live in like companies that give more back to their customers.

I'm writing a new review to reflect the current situation. Log-in issues have been fixed and so far so good on photo check deposits. Checks are taking and clearing fast. This has gone from a one star experience to a five star experience. Good app and a great alternative to conventional checking accounts. I highly recommend this.

I love the access that I have to my statements. At the same time I have put in my password and it is wrong even after I change it and know what it is. I take it as another step to protect my.which had not been compromised since I got this account. While the other bank account i have, has been compromised 5 times in the 13months. I have had Tmable bank for I believe 8 months. Never compromised. So I will go through any checks and balances that I need to and this is my go to account now.

Every time I log onto this app, I repeatedly get told to retry my connection or log off every single time I open the app, as soon as I open the app. I have had it for months and have not gotten to use it at all. I've tried opening it with so my different wifi and network connections and no matter what my connection says that app always opens and immediately tells me my connection is bad.

title: Money Manager: Expense Tracker, Free Budgeting App
description:
Money Manager helps you track your financial activity efficiently. Its simple design makes it lightweight, straightforward and very easy to use.  It‚Äôs done in one click, because you don‚Äôt need to fill anything except the amount. You need just a few SECONDS daily to save the amount and each spending purpose. No matter where you are just a couple of taps will save your expense. 

Key features:

Easy to Use, Clean and Intuitive Expense & Income Tracker
‚Ä¢ Intuitive and easy to use user interface. No redundancy Add new records extremely fast. 

Tracking Expenses and Incomes
‚Ä¢ Easily record the transaction to track where your money comes and goes.

The Whole Picture in One Place
‚Ä¢ Clear view on your financial life. Better understand where your money comes and goes with visualized reports about income, expense by time and category. 


Spending / Income Pie Chart
‚Ä¢ See your spending distribution on the nice and informative chart or get, view your transactions grouped by categories.

Budget and Bill Organizing
‚Ä¢ Organizing bills by week, month and year as well as by categories.Record all items in a single transaction with different category and amount.

Reminder
‚Ä¢ Set reminders to remain you to record transactions every day.

No Advertising, Without limitation Features, Free
‚Ä¢ Money Manager can be used for Free, without ads and no features restriction.

Languages

‚Ä¢ English
‚Ä¢ Chinese (Traditional)
‚Ä¢ Japanese
‚Ä¢ Korean
‚Ä¢ Russian
‚Ä¢ Spanish
‚Ä¢ Portuguese
‚Ä¢ Hindi
‚Ä¢ Indonesian
‚Ä¢ German
‚Ä¢ French

Money management is always complicated and most of the time you get to wonder where did all your money go, luckily, our simple personal finance app can helps you easily manage your money and keep track of your expense. You can stay on top of your money anytime, anywhere.

comments: Disappointed with the feature of not being able to restore your data from an older device. I was consistently maintaining a tab of all my expenses on a daily basis for the last 7 months. However, my phone was stolen a couple of days back. Now, after installing the app on my new phone, I'm not able to login and view all my expenses. The whole purpose of using this app is defeated if I cannot login to another device and view my expenses. Very disappointed.

I rarely leave comments but I love the app. It's smooth and easy to use. I've been using this app for like two weeks already and it really helped me track my expenses which also helped me save up. My only problem is that I can't sign in or connect the app to my facebook or gmail. I hope you can do something about it!

Great, easy to use app to just track where your money goes. What does annoy me: you cannot set date range. We don't all get paid on the first or last of the month. If my month runs 15th - 14th, I am unable to properly track monthly expenses. Wish this would be fixed. Then 5 stars from me!

Such a great UI. The best interface and convenient to use. Had fallen in love with the whole operation. But despite may negative reviews the developers are ignorant of the login issue. Please atleast respond so we know you're working on a fix. Don't ruin your whole product just because of such a simple issue. Please fix it. I myself am a developer and know how important a product is to a developer. Please care about it. And care about the what your consumers think.

Love this app. I am only just getting to really use it now I have moved out. It has an easy pie chart to work out where all your money is going. It will also have the amount you spent and a percentage. I learnt 46% is a bit high for my household bills. Bit have paid a one off insurance for a car. So this will vary monthly. I'm not the best with money and find It hard to save. It would be a good idea to be able to add 2 savers accounts. As I don't mix my main account with the savings ones.

comments: The game wasn't connecting due to bad connection with the servers. This appears to have been corrected. However, before the problem with the servers, I was at around level 197 with about $5.50 in my bank. Yes, over two months of playing and this was all I won. I hung in as I really enjoy this game. I didn't want to start over though.

It's okay if you want to play. But its deceiving on the part that you make money for games. At first you win alot, makes you feel like the game is truthful, until you get to $6.75, before cash out. Then you wont win a penny. Plus lots of ads before and after every game. I understand they have to make money, but keep the same energy level dont just make us win enough before cash out to mislead us.

Easily one of the most enjoyable games around... until you cash in for your payout. I did get my $50.00 Amazon gift card just fine but I can't get into my account any longer and I can't play..... it always pops up with a message saying "can't communicate with server...check my connection ". I can access everything else just fine on my phone, but sudden not this one. The problem is not on my end, other than getting locked out because I cashed in for the $50.00 gift card. Very disappointing....

Loved the app to begin with, played several times a day for several weeks. All of a sudden, I was unable to connect to the game. No problem with any other app or any other internet connections. Uninstall and reinstall and still no luck. Hope to hear from someone about a fix because I miss playing! If in able to get back to enjoying my game, I'll change rating to 5++ Star!

I gave it four stars instead of 5 for two reasons. 1 i am also stuck at 6.75 but all money making apps slow down or halt when it comes to giving out winnings. So thats no suprise but kinda crappy no doubt. 2 is because there are small glitches in the game that will cost you lives or boosters that you work hard for. On a positive note the game is fun and addictive. Challenging but doable. Just as a should be. A real great job there. To win money (or at some point cash out) is just a plus for me.

title: Monefy - Money Manager
description:
How to track your expenses successfully? We know that it‚Äôs easy. You only need to add each expense you do‚Ä¶ no more than that! And Monefy is going to help you. Just add new records when you are buying a coffee or taking a taxi. It‚Äôs done in one click, because you don‚Äôt need to fill anything except the amount. It has never been so quick and enjoyable!

Do you own a phone and a tablet? Or you want to track expenses with your significant other? Monefy fits the best. You can safely synchronize data between all your devices. Create or change records, add new categories or delete old ones and they will be present on other devices right away!

8. Backup and export data in one click
9. Use budget mode

11. Multiple accounts support
12. Built-in calculator

comments: Great app to track your expenses and savings !! Transfer feature can be better modified to categorize into payments & savings. If I'm transferring amt from chequing acct to credit card or savings acct, then pie chart simply shows transfer icons, that makes it difficult to identify whether I have saved money or made a payment. If I choose to + or - the amt from an acct, it should be ask me from which acct money is coming from or going to. This will reconcile both the accts, which isn't happening.

Pretty good app, but two issues that if fixed would make it perfect. 1) Weeks calculated as month divided by 4 so as there are more than 28 days in most months you could stick to budget each week you still ending up over spending for a month. Calculation should be 1 month * 12 / 52 to accurately create a weekly budget. 2) you can't change the start date for calculation so if you want to draw a fresh budget line you have to purge all your old data.

Definitely best way to keep track of your money! I would like to see an option to hide seeing your transfers though. My transfers are always much higher than any of my other expenses, so my expenses are always red with transfers. But other than that, there's no problem with the app!

Updating all my expenses such as groceries. Car repair. Food. Insurance. Etc No need Internet to use it. Transfer past transactions to new phone via data export feature. No need to enter transaction again. Convenient. User friendly. Essential for tracking expenses.
Wish they had subcategories capabilities. When you export the data, you should be able to choose a date range and not all data (including future recurrings). Easy to use though, but could be better

Even a small financial emergency can leave you feeling hopeless. Despite that, there are options that can help you get over this challenge and build a healthier financial future for yourself and your family. First, you may need to learn about various payday advance loans and how they can help.

Payday advance loans, also known as payday loans, typically let you borrow small amounts of money so you can pay for emergency expenses like car repairs and healthcare. Like most payday advance loans, you need to repay the money you borrow quickly, usually within a couple of weeks, which is when the lender assumes you will get your next paycheck.

Why Choose a Cash Advance from MONEY LOAN?

Our customer service representatives are always very professional and discreet when talking with our clients. Additionally, our application process is fast, extremely secure and very user-friendly. 

1.  Faster Approval - One of the main advantages of applying for a payday loan with us is that you will know if you are approved in a matter of minutes after submitting your online application. In addition, your funds will be deposited directly into your checking account.

2.  Higher Funding Amounts - MONEY LOAN offers some of the highest funding amounts of all online payday loan companies. First-time applicants can borrow between $1200 and $1600, and after a positive payment history is established, customers can go as high as $10,000 and above. We reward our existing customers by offering higher loan amounts through our exclusive loan step-up program. 

3.  Faster Application Process - Our online application can be completed in less than five minutes, and typically you will know if you are approved the same day. We offer a Facebook option when applying that enables you to auto-fill your application using the data stored in your Facebook account. This results in even faster approval times. Whether you choose the Facebook option or the standard route, the entire process is digital, requires no faxing and can be completed from the privacy of your home or office. You can even apply for a loan while on the go using a smartphone or tablet.

4.  Private & Secure - We respect our clients' privacy, and we go to great lengths to protect your financial information. The security technology we utilize to protect your data is the same technology used by some of the largest financial institutions. All of your personal information is transmitted through an SSL-encrypted connection and stored on encrypted storage devices. We use military-grade 256-bit encryption to secure all of your transactions, so you can rest assured that your data is safe with us.

5.  Bilingual Staff - MONEY LOAN employs a team of friendly and professional staff members that speak both English and Spanish to assist you with any questions you may have about our service. Our support team can assist you in translating any information about our products or with any questions you may have about our application process. Please contact us to request a Spanish speaking customer service representative. Our goal is to provide you with exceptional service regardless of your language preference. After you have been approved for a loan, you can be sure that we will continue to provide you with outstanding customer service in both English or Spanish regarding any questions you may have about your account.
