title: Possible Finance: Borrow Money Fast & Build Credit
description:
Possible provides installment loans up to $500* that build credit. Apply to borrow money, get approved, and receive cash within a few minutes! Join thousands of satisfied customers who are using a loan from Possible to avoid harmful overdraft fees, borrow money fast, and build credit. 

More cash than paycheck advance apps
A $100 cash advance isn‚Äôt always enough. Avoid overdraft fees, payday loan apps, and payday advance apps and borrow money up to $500* in minutes.

Get money fast
Don‚Äôt wait until payday and get hit by overdraft fees! Apply for a loan in a few simple steps. Once approved, money can be sent straight to your debit card so that you have immediate access to your loan.

Build credit
Get immediate cash help as well as an affordable way to build credit. We'll report to TransUnion, Equifax and Experian, making our loan a great way to repair your score! Payday advances and payday loans can‚Äôt do this!

Flexible repayments
A more adaptable cash option than other loans or payday advance alternatives, multiple repayments are spread out across the next few paychecks and rescheduling is easy.

Good credit not required
You don‚Äôt need good credit to get money! Our loan app links directly with your existing bank account to help make an intelligent decision.

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs like borrowing money from a good friend...Seriously the best experience I‚Äôve ever had with a lender...I will not go anywhere else for installment loans from now on! 110% recommend!‚Äù -NellyVille1027 on August 25, 2018

Possible is currently available to California, Florida, Texas, Ohio, Washington, Idaho, and Utah residents. We're launching in additional states and you'll be added to the waitlist by registering for an account. 

Loan terms, fees, and APRs vary depending on state regulations. Our state licenses and fees can be found here: https://www.possiblefinance.com/licenses/. Our average loan term for paid-off loans is over 60 days. As an example, per Washington state law, ‚Äãa loan from Possible Finance has a max fee of 15% for every $100 borrowed.

*Max loan amounts vary by state and subject to lender approval

comments: I'm impressed, I didn't expect to qualify and did immediately despite having a low credit score which I'm trying to improve thanks to Possible. My only minor complaint is the 4 payment option is really 2 because 2 of the payments are scheduled for the same day. Still one of if not the best loan apps available. Helps in a pinch and builds credit, thus far I'm absolutely satisfied. Great customer service too. Thanks for the opportunity!

Really easy process, and very quick response for my first loan. Had an emergency and needed to loan again, now I cannot view my loan or payment dates to make any changes. The app will load only partway and then I get an error message. This is so fustrating and I cannot reach customer service at all. There needs to be a better way to help customers!!!!

Thank you! Amazing app that makes me feel confident using. I was sick with longterm illness so my credit took a hit with medical bills & drop in income for few years. My wife has been trying to help get it up a bit & this app is definitely a Plus for both building credit & helping out when in a tight spot. To top it off? I found out the headquarters is in my state. Awesomely Awesome! Credit score is climbing!

Beware. Seems good to have access to borrow money with a reasonable bad credit interest rate. Unfortunately, when you have an issue they don't have a working customer service number and only email you back. The emails are somewhat generic; which happens often when you aren't talking directly to someone. I've wanted to pay off my defaulted loan for months now. I get emails telling me to do so in app and the suggestions aren't working.Don't deal with any company that doesn't have a customer serv#

comments: It's fun I suppose, but it's a little disheartening that you never really win any money from it.... that was what the ads implied and pretty much the main reason I installed it. It's still a fun time waster, but I would be far more inclined to play it far more regularly if I had an incentive to do so.... Unfortunately that promise made in their ads for this game is definitely not delivered in the app itself.

I enjoy this game. Your chances of free money are basically at a zero but I enjoy the game regardless. However my main issue is the sound control. There doesn't seem to be any option for turning off sound, and the sound the game makes is annoying so I need to turn off all other sounds, I like to listen to music while playing games. So I took off a star for that. Otherwise it's good.

This solitaire game is a lot of fun but as I was watching the count after winning a hand the numbers started counting backwards so this needs to be fixed. I've been stuck for weeks at the same figure for awhile now and was noticing that the points were depleting. PLEASE FIX ! Also, the "Bonus Ship" say, before you start the game gives you the wrong times when collecting the "Times You Get" for "Bonus" doesn't correlate . Fix this issue and I'll give you 5 stars. Fun Game other than this issue.

This game is nothing but false advertisement and a cash cow for the developers. The highest score you will ever achieve in this game is 250. That's the max even though it says people have higher ones they dont. I reached the 250 with a point bonus in 1 min 30 sec. I played another game with the same bonus and in 35 seconds I got 230 something for the score. So the game just randomly makes up a number so they dont actually give any money out because no one has ever mentioned recieving the payout.

It's fun and all, but my tickets keep disappearing. I thought I was imagining it at first, but I had over 10k tickets before I closed the app, and when I came back there were only 6k. It's a very aggravating glitch, and considering how these apps are normally scams, it gives off a very bad impression

title: Wallet - Money, Budget, Finance & Expense Tracker
description:
Become your own finance manager with Wallet‚Äî  a spending tracker and personal finance planner that helps you save money and plan your budgets.  Wallet is not just an expense tracker or budgeting app.  It‚Äôs about getting things under control now so that you can make wiser decisions and plan for the future‚Å†‚Äî whether that‚Äôs a month, a year, or a decade down the line.

Looking for an app to manage business finance? Check out Board by BudgetBakers! Simply scroll to the bottom of the store listing and you'll find it in More by BudgetBakers.
 
WHY YOU SHOULD USE WALLET
 
Toss your notebooks and spreadsheets, and budget for clear, tangible goals that are easy to track in real-time. Tracking your expenses just got easier. Keep full control with beautifully designed reports on your accounts. 

You can easily control your spending and save more using the finance tracker and planner.
 
Wallet is a money manager and budget planner designed to help you from day one.  With continuous insights, you‚Äôre able to stay in control of your personal finance for the long-term. 
 
WHAT MAKES WALLET UNIQUE:
 
Automatic Bank Updates - Transactions are automatically and securely synced with your bank, then smartly categorized and factored into your budget. With 3,500 participating banks worldwide, you‚Äôll save loads of time not having to track every penny.
 
Imports or Manual Bank Updates - You can now import all your transaction data from sources of your choice so you will get a full report for simple expense tracking. Be it from your bank or your own spreadsheets.
 
Flexible Budgets - Budgets help you plan your spending & save money for the future thanks to the integrated money manager. Whatever it is you need to accomplish, from paying off debt to buying a car or saving for retirement, this budgeting app offers the flexibility to meet your goals and cleverly react to any changing financial circumstances.
 
Insightful reports - Easy-to-understand graphs and financial overviews give you actionable insights about the state of your finances, across bank accounts, credit and debit cards, debts and cash. You can get your income & expense report.
 
Sharing selected accounts - Selected accounts can be shared with family, friends or colleagues who need to cooperate on a budget. Everyone can contribute from any platform, whether it be Android, iPhone or the Web.


Other features: Multiple currency support, Automatic cloud sync, Receipt and warranty tracking, Categories and templates, geo-mapping transactions, hash-tagging, Shopping lists, Exports to CSV/XLS/PDF, debt management, PIN security, Standing orders, notifications, reports and more.

With Wallet, you can expect updates with new features and improvements routinely.
 
 
HOW TO START USING WALLET
1. Download the app
2. Create Account
3. Get going: budget and track expenses like a master!
  
Wallet is certified with eTrust

recentChanges: Improve group sharing (permissions are back)
comments: Updated my rating to 5* because I was able to find all my past records for EACH category under Statistics>Reports. A very useful app. I now know: 1. How much I spent paying debts. 2. How much money I have in Total. 3. My biggest expenses and 4. I don't need to remember when a payment was made because everything is recorded in real time and easily retrievable. I'll buy the paid version. Thanks to the developer.

I was extremely excited that you could connect bank accounts and have them sync on their own when you purchase premium. The reason I'm giving a two star rating is I could only get 4 accounts connected and keep them connected. We bank with Capital One and I was able to get it connected and then it just wouldn't connect. Target, Kohls and a few others just won't connect. Get your syncing fixed and I might come back. Going to request a refund.

Decent enough free version, though there are a few problems. The biggest one for me is that the "balance forecast" appears to be counting my planned payments as positives instead of negatives - i.e. my landlord is paying me rent instead of the other way around. As a result the numbers are so wrong that it's almost comical. I have to use an excel sheet for this instead. There are a couple of things I wish were added too, like being able to separate expenses per day by category in reports.

This is clearly the result of a competent team which cared about user experience. One annoying thing is that I "can't delete record in connected account". I'm tracking a bank account and two credit cards. It calculates all of the expenses from the credit cards twice - once for each purchase on the credit card statement, and then the monthly billing of the bank account as well. There should be a simple way to exclude a transaction from the statistics.

Looked very good structurally and I could see a great future. But you have to keep connecting to the banks. One of my banks it cant connect now. But competative software can. It also doesn't cover all the banks I use. A competative product does a lot more banks. I have reported all this to wallet but wishful promises are never delivered. And I have bought a lifetime subscription. Shame on me. I cannot see why it is the editors choice still.

title: Mint: Budget, Bills, & Finance Tracker
description:
Finally, there‚Äôs one place to manage all your finances with ease. Mint is the free money manager and financial tracker app from the makers of TurboTax¬Æ that does it all. We bring together your bank accounts, credit cards, bills and investments so you know where you stand. See what you‚Äôre spending, where you can save money, and track your bills in Mint like never before. You can even keep track of your credit score to help you be smart about it, no credit card required.
 
SEE EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE	
Get a more complete picture of your financial life. We bring together everything from account balances and spending to your free credit score, net worth and more.
 
MANAGE BILLS & MONEY TOGETHER
Track bills right alongside your account balances. You‚Äôll know what's due, when it‚Äôs due, and the money you have to put toward your balances.
 
SAVE TIME & MONEY 
With one place to keep track of your finances, there‚Äôs no need to log into multiple sites. Plus, we‚Äôll give you savings tips to help with budgeting and debt.
 
BUDGET BETTER     	
Effortlessly create budgets you can stick to. To help you save smarter from day one, we even make a few for you based on your spending.
 
BE SMART ABOUT YOUR CREDIT SCORE
Get your free credit score, no credit card required. You‚Äôll learn how it‚Äôs calculated and get tips.*
 
SAY GOODBYE TO LATE FEES        	
Get bill pay reminders so you pay bills on time and avoid missed payments and credit card fees.
 
STAY SECURE
We‚Äôre serious about security and use measures like multi-factor authentication, designed to help you protect access to your account. Plus, Mint comes from the people who make TurboTax¬Æ, trusted by millions with sensitive data, and we participate in security scanning with VeriSign.
 
SYNCS WITH THE MINT WEB APP
Mint‚Äôs great on the go, but you can also use the desktop version at Mint.com. Sync your bank accounts, credit cards, budgeting, spending and more across your devices. You can even export spreadsheets from the web, and more.

WHY DO MILLIONS TRUST MINT?
Time Magazine: The 50 Best Apps of the Year (2016)
PC Magazine: What to Do When You Go Over Budget in Mint.com (2016)
Nerd Wallet: Financial Fitness - 7 Exercises to Build your Credit Muscle (2016)
Huffington Post: 5 Things To Know After You Graduate (2016)
Tech Times: Save Money in 2015: Here are the Best Money Management Apps (2015)
Kiplinger‚Äôs: 10 Great Saving Money-Saving Apps (2014) 
Money Magazine: Best Finance Tool For Budgeting (2014)
Wired: The Best Apps for Budgeting Your Cash (2014)
Android Connections: Best Personal Finance Apps of 2015 for Android (2015)
 
FROM INTUIT INC.
Mint is part of a suite of financial tools that includes TurboTax¬Æ, QuickBooks¬Æ, QuickBooks Self-Employed‚Ñ¢ and ProConnect‚Ñ¢. Wherever you are in life, whatever you do, Intuit can help you save money and simplify the business of life.
 
To learn how Intuit works to protect your privacy, please visit 
https://security.intuit.com/index.php/privacy

When you download and use Mint, you agree to the Mint Terms of Service https://www.mint.com/terms
 
*Intuit is not a credit repair company. We do not provide credit repair services to repair or improve your credit profile or score. All information is provided for educational use only.
 
Message and data rates apply. Reminders subject to interruptions due to various reasons including but not limited to internet/mobile service outages. Account balances may not immediately reflect recent transactions. Internet/mobile data required for financial data refresh.
 
Mint currently connects to US and Canadian financial institutions only.

recentChanges:
Hey, there!
In this update, we made some improvements and smashed some bugs to make your Mint experience even more awesome. Also fixed crashes on app initialization and tab navigation for some users.

We‚Äôre always working on new ways to improve your experience with Mint. Let us know what you think by leaving a review!
comments: This is a great app. You can link all of your credit cards, bank accounts, expenses and know how much you have. It takes some times to update after payments because it goes off of the financial institutions and their processing times. Once the payments are withdrawn. It updates your balances. This is how banks work. It's a great app and easy to use. You can set budgets for your expenses. I set budgets for fuel, fast food, coffee, cash, etc. The app recognizes your expenses and categories them.

I'm changing my rating from 2 to 4 stars. The app has come a long way. The only thing that I'd like to see happen is the app being faster to recognize transactions in my checking account. Otherwise, great app with an awesome budget feature. You can really customize the budget and put transactions in whatever category you want or just go with the suggested category.

Takes about two months to figure out the budgeting and how it aligns with your spending but since I've started using it in October I've been able to consistently save money and pay off credit cards. I have really enjoyed the bar charts to show when you are green, yellow, or red in terms of spending habits. I always used an excel sheet for budgeting but it is so nice to have an app auto update all expenses.

I used Mint for a long time then it stopped syncing to my bank account in spite of numerous attempts to fix it. I'm sad that I will be looking for an alternative app if these problems continue much longer. Who has time to devote to figuring out the help system maze via Facebook or Twitter? Not me. I'm obviously not the only one experiencing this either.

I like using the app so I can check my finances in real time. It works pretty well. Here are some things I'd like to be able to do. - rules carry-over from desktop version to app - ability to assign categories to pending transactions (otherwise, the app miscategorizes and we get a notification of over-spending) - modified: adding a new merchant is possible! Up'd my review to 4 stars.

‚Ä¢ No foreign transaction fees
‚Ä¢ No monthly maintenance fee
‚Ä¢ No ACH transfer fee
‚Ä¢ No debit card replacement fee

Plus:
‚Ä¢ No minimum balance requirement
‚Ä¢ Get paid up to two days early with direct deposit^
‚Ä¢ Use Google Pay‚Ñ¢ and Samsung Pay‚Ñ¢ for quick and easy payments



MANAGE YOUR MONEY EASILY

Your Varo Bank Account helps you stay in control of your money.

‚Ä¢ Instantly send money to anyone who uses Varo
‚Ä¢ Track spending and account activity with instant alerts
‚Ä¢ Send money to and from external accounts
‚Ä¢ We‚Äôll mail checks for you for free


SAVE AND EARN MORE

Automatic savings tools let you save and earn money easily. First get a Varo Bank Account, then set up your high-yield Varo Savings Account.

‚Ä¢ Automatic savings tools let you save money without thinking
‚Ä¢ No minimum balance requirement to earn interest
‚Ä¢ Start earning 1.92% APY*, then earn up to 2.80% APY* if you meet these three requirements each calendar month:
‚Ä¢ Keep a savings balance of $50,000 or less
‚Ä¢ Make at least five Varo Visa¬Æ Debit Card purchases each calendar month, AND 
‚Ä¢ Receive total direct deposits of $1,000 or more each calendar month


NO FEE OVERDRAFT REQUIREMENTS
 
To be eligible for No Fee Overdraft to overdraw your Varo Bank Account up to $50 on transactions on any transaction made with your Varo Visa Debit Card you must meet both of these requirements:
‚Ä¢ Make at least five qualifying Varo Visa Debit Card purchases in each calendar month, AND
‚Ä¢ Receive total payroll or government direct deposits of $1,000 or more in the same calendar month.

Once you qualify, enroll by turning on No Fee Overdraft in the app.
 

STAY SAFE AND SECURE

Keeping your money and data protected is at the top of our list.

‚Ä¢ Your deposits are FDIC insured to at least $250,000 through The Bancorp Bank; Member FDIC
‚Ä¢ Your debit card is protected with Visa¬Æ Zero Liability‚Ä°
‚Ä¢ Your data is protected with advanced 256-bit AES-level encryption, access control, secure processes, and audits


LEGAL THINGS

If you‚Äôre a current customer with a Varo loan, we strongly recommend you do not switch to the Android app right now. We‚Äôll start offering lending services for Android next year!

^Early access to direct deposit funds depends on timing of payer‚Äôs submission of deposits. We generally post such deposits on the day they are received which may be up to 2 days earlier than the payer‚Äôs scheduled payment date.
 
*Varo Annual Percentage Yields (APYs) are accurate as of January 22, 2020. These rates are variable and may change. No minimum balance required to open account. Balance in Savings must be at least $0.01 to earn interest.
 
‚Ä°You must notify your financial institution immediately of any unauthorized use. For specific restrictions, limitations and other details, please consult your issuer.
 
Bank Account Services provided by The Bancorp Bank; Member FDIC. The Varo Visa Debit Card is issued by The Bancorp Bank pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc and may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

recentChanges: Courageously conquering bugs and enhancing the app so we can make banking even easier for you. Keep sending your feedback and questions to help@varomoney.com!
comments: This is a great way to get paid earlier and as of right now I have not had any issues. I like the fact you can save your change with the round up feature of the debit card. This is one of the easiest to use banking apps I have seen if you a tired of bug banks keeping your money for 2 days on your paycheck deposit to make money from the interest then you need to switch I did and I love it.

Very satisfied, the app is simple and easy to use. I love getting my check earlier than most of my fellow employees, it's really nice getting paid when I'm off and not right as I'm about to head back to work. I love the fee free 50$ overdrawing, I don't always use it but when I need it, it's very nice to have. I love how quickly I get alerted of any and all transactions. Edit: Had to take away a star because no fee overdraft doesnt always work like it's supposed to so its unreliable at times.

I think the UI is a bit unappealing, but it's efficient and works well, so I'll live lol. Easy to open the account, easy to link an external account, easy to transfer funds, etc. Savings account gives 1.92% yield, so I like that. I opened this account primarily to use for saving. If you're looking for online banking, this is good, as there are literally no fees, and if you meet certain criteria, you can even overdraft $50 without any fees.

Love the notifications when my check hits and love how everything I need to do is easily accessible. I didn't appreciate being locked out of my account twice and having to do ID verifications. This was after I was already receiving my checks direct deposited. That was interesting, but I'm glad I stuck around. I've had no issues since!

The app is good in general. But, I just faced a major drawback, first hand. The app does not allow me to log in when I'm outside the US. Works perfectly fine when I'm either in the US or using a US based VPN. Please fix the app so that I can access my account when I'm travelling outside the US. Update: Looks like they've fixed the issue. I can log into the app when I'm outside the US. Thanks for taking care of this so fast!

title: Money machine 2
description:
Greetings, ambitious money maker!

Money Machine 2.0 is a fun coin pusher simulator and business idle game with a new business buildings and upgrades.
Each business unlock new treasure. At first would be thick money packs. Money rain starts, cash dozer push income and then collect gaming money.  Further would be much more expensive treasure as a gold bars, gems and other.
Game bank is for money tower. It is 1m x 1m and as high as your game score. For example, real money cube 1m x1m x 1m could cost more than 80M $. Yes, it is a real capitalism. 
Seaside is for energy recreation upgrades (car garage, villa, yacht and other).
And one more thing. Money machine 2 is just a simulator and there is absolutely no payouts! You are playing with gaming currency! 
This game is an idle clicker, business simulator, coin and cash dozer, and some kind of money printer simulator - all in one. So become a real capitalist and money maker!


As you playing money machine 2, you start ‚Äúfinancial placebo‚Äù for you. As you go on collecting game treasures, you increasing a chance to get money in real life, and get rich, especially if you will find real job in real life and work hard. That is true!;)

comments: Seems like a good game at the start. But The chances/odds of winning even a small windfall is extremely low. I really enjoyed this hand in the beginning. However, as you continueto play the app continues to say bonus pending, in which it never comes. I emailed them to inquire and they responded. The apps advertisements freezes the game and you don't get credit back. I will play out all my points and discontinue use. I regrate that because I really did like the game. I just don't like feeling like I'm being shammed.

Graphics need a little work and the way the slots spin is annoying because there really isn't a stop spin option, just sit on autoplay. The other critic I have is during the bonus, if your down to the last card the system doesn't show you what it was it flashes fast, but if you match 2 b4 that it shows the breakdown. I am pointing this out because 2x I thought I won the $ and that's when it flashed past the win screen

It sucks the amount of forced to watch all the way through ads constantly... I haven't won any money, and it don't look like you can. Looks to me the winners it claims to have are fake. It really sucks to manually tap spin each spin, install the auto spin option you cheap nonpaying real cash game!!!

Seems like you only win coins when you level up pay out on the slots is very low so no matter what you win your coins slowly go cause they want you to spend real money on fake coins and you almost never get bonus or scatter good luck with your game you will have a 3.0 rating in a month once people play and see what im talking about this game sucks and is a scam dont download or go ahead and see for yourself

comments: Very slow - a simple 100 EUR transfer from PayPal balance within SEPA took 3 working days to complete. The process feels dated, competing services provide ID verification to speed up transfers setup and often complete transactions within the same day. Fees and exchange rates do not stand out either.

Terrible app. Was letting me transfer money all along until one fine day the team decided that they couldn't verify information in my account. So now I can't transfer any more. If the information could not be verified how was i transferring before? Very unreliable. Might stop working right when you need to transfer money urgently. Thankfully there are many other apps that do the same thing, with less headache.

Its was good past 6 years Im using it. It was legit and transaction will be completed right away..you only have to wait a second!!! However, now its either website are slow or you have to wait 5 days before transaction will be completed.. If its going to be like this , might as well use western union or other money remitance If I have to wait that long!

Very good & fast service. However for Referral money you need to sort out by ur self they don't bother. My main issue is that there currency conversion isn't good, there's othet legit apps who provide the same fast payment service with better rate conversion & with less fee charges. Step up ur game xoom i like you but not using u anymore

Be careful and make sure your not over paying. No longer using this app unless of an emergency. They keep about 800 pesos after charging me a 5 dollars for fee. 800 pesos is about 40 dollars at the time. So they try to fool costumers thinking it was inexpensive. But at the end of the day they are taking a 45 dollar fee. Very expensive. Other than that for me the app was very easy to use and very handy.

comments: Pretty good, not perfect.So I was about to get 5 dollars in my first day,which is pretty good! Most surveys you won't get to do,and because Poll Pay doesn't make the surveys I am sure they cannot fix that. I enjoy the 1 cent payouts if the surveys don't work, if you spend an hour or two a day, they really start to add up. This app is a little glichy and I would like to see this fixed in some other updates. I wish we could have a way to match us up with surveys we can actually do, like a profile.

On the verge of uninstalling this app. The app in general is good and you get lots of surveys, but recently i am constantly completing surveys, then the ones I'm applicable for it let's me do the whole thing then there's an error page at the end, so i waste my whole time doing the survey to get no rewards. It's happening too often now, feeling mugged

Overall, great app. I earned $2.80 in the first day, and the 1 cents you earn on elimated surveys are cool and add up well overtime. However one specific survey company/option I've had issues with - Pollfish. I have finished 3 of their surveys, all 30 minutes each, answered all the questions properly and sent feedback, only for them to "screen out" at the end and not give me the 20c I worked over the past 30 minutes for. I hope this issue can be fixed. Otherwise a fairly good app.

Your app on first opening glitches out bad... I couldnt even fill out the questionnaire about my life and income without it glitching out... got to job and kept glitching out and then the state in which I live wasnt showing up with the rest of the states... deleting app. Yall should try out your own app and make sure it works before launching...

title: Earnin - Get paid today
description:
Earnin is a community-supported app with a mission to build a financial system that works for people. Access up to $500 between paychecks, explore savings options on medical bills, help avoid unnecessary overdraft fees, and earn cash back on your purchases.
 
Four financial tools in one simple, easy-to-use app. With Earnin, there are no hidden fees. Just pay what you think is fair.

THREE SIMPLE STEPS TO CASH OUT:
---------------------------------------------------------
1. Connect your bank and tell us where you work.
2. We‚Äôll verify your bank and confirm your hours worked; you cash out up to $100 per day and tip what you think is fair, between $0-14*.
3. On payday, we‚Äôll debit your account for the money you cashed out plus any tip.
 
FAST FACTS:
---------------------
‚Ä¢ 75%: 75% of members say Earnin has increased their ability to pay for gas and get to work.
 
‚Ä¢ 15M: Community members have tipped extra to cover a fellow member‚Äôs tip over 15 million times.
 
‚Ä¢ $133: Health Aid has found average negotiated savings of $133 per community member. (Results not guaranteed)
 
‚Ä¢ $100M:  If members made the same purchases without accessing their pay using Earnin, they would have incurred over $100M in additional overdraft fees in June 2019.
 
OUR TOOLS:
--------------------
+ Cash Out 
Get paid when you want. Up to $100 per day, and up to $500 per pay period.
 
+ Health Aid
Send us your medical bill and we will negotiate with your medical provider to try to reduce your balance and/or find you a more affordable payment plan.
 
+ Balance Shield
Balance Shield Alerts notify you when your bank balance is getting low. Balance Shield Cash Outs send up to $100 of your earnings directly into your account to help avoid the chance of overdrafts.*
 
+ Cash Back Rewards:
Earn up to 10% cash back when you shop at 1000‚Äôs of participating local and national businesses.
 
OTHER FEATURES:
------------------------------
+ Lightning Speed
Connect your debit card to your Earnin account and receive your money in less time, with no additional charge!

+ Live Chat Support
If you have any questions or issues with the app, our Live Chat team is available 24/7, including all holidays.

+ 256-Bit Bank-Level Data Encryption
Earnin uses bank-level encryption to protect and secure your data.

+ Financial Calendar
A handy tool that informs you of any upcoming payments.
 

*Note that tipping options will vary between tools.
*Once Balance Shield is activated, it must be reset after each use.

Love the app? Leave a review! Your feedback helps us improve your experience.

recentChanges: To create a better experience for our community, we made bug fixes and performance enhancements in the app. Love Earnin? Rate us! Providing feedback is one way our community looks out for one another.
comments: A little tricky to get things set up properly. Needs work to streamline things. "Lightning speed" doesn't work with all banks (example: my bank placed a 3 day "check hold" on transactions through debit). Once setup is done though, it works really well. Pretty accurate daily logging and cash outs happen exactly when promised. Hands down, it's worlds better than taking out payday loans. If you're in a cycle of payday loan debt, do yourself a favor and try this app. (not a sponsored post).

3/19/2020 - Just wanted to give an update. This app was working great....for a while. But earlier this month it just stopped working. Now I dont know whether it is on their end or something with my bank, but I find certain things funny and annoying. They keep raising my max - yet I cant even withdraw. They cant access my bank info -- but they will gladly take money out even without knowing my balance. This needs to be fixed soon because it is very frustrating. They will cause me to overdraw.

Complete garbage! Used to work well, saved me a few times. I started having bank update/screenshot issues every single time I tried to use the app. Asked for help, at first someone could manually accept my screenshot, fixed my problem quickly, after this happened a few times, they decided to delete my banking info "to fix the problem on their end" asked me to redo my banking account info through the app. I have tried 100s of times have cont. to reach out for help and still won't work. Trash app.

It started off great! Then every pay period started experiencing Bank connectivity issue. I spoke to a number of reps about the situation and They keep giving me the same info about the app. I tried restarting it. Tried putting Bank info again. Nothing would allow me to connect. Im 5 days into the NEW pay period. Was able to Cash out once. Still havent gotten back to me about the problem. This app is great at time. But sucks alot more.

This app has helped me more than a few times. Recently it's getting harder to want to use it anymore. I don't mind the tip because it does help, but here recently it's taking longer for the funds to hit, and it is 10:37 Mar 10th and the app still thinks it's Mar 9th. Would just consider it a minor inconvenience but it's all the time now.

title: Ria Money Transfer ‚Äì Send Money Online Anywhere
description:
Downloading the Ria Money Transfer app gives you access to our 369,000+ locations worldwide in the palm of your hand. Our enhanced mobile experience makes it easy to select a preferred way to send money with the best exchange rates available. Plus, with our ever-expanding network, the funds are transferred conveniently to friends or family via bank deposit, cash, or home delivery.  

Why use Ria Money Transfer for your money-sending needs? We can think of a few reasons! 

Speed and Convenience
Say goodbye to the days of carrying around checks or cash, and wiring money. With Ria's mobile app you can send money right from your couch! Ria strives to provide an expedited money transfer process. Funds reach their destination in as little as 15 minutes. Additionally, repeat transfers are now faster than ever! Just swipe a finger, and your money is on its way.

Easy to Use
Our newly-improved application makes sending money easier than ever. The modernized visual design, versatile functionality, and intuitive money-transfer process were built with your comfort and experience in mind. Try it out and let us know what you think!

Secure and Reliable
We know it‚Äôs stressful to send money, so our priority is to help users feel secure sending with Ria. We‚Äôve been in the money-transfer business for over 30 years and know what it takes to keep your information, and money, protected. With over 1 billion transfers securely sent, your money is safe with us.

Great Exchange Rates and Low Fees
At Ria, we want you to get the best rates! Our Check Prices Calculator allows for easy rate comparisons and helps find the most-affordable way to send money to loved ones.

New Features
We‚Äôre excited to announce these highly-anticipated features:
   - Completely redesigned application 
   - Clean, easy-to-use user interface 
   - Smoother transitions and clear steps to complete a money transfer 
   - Improved functionality of the Price Calculator 
   - Comprehensive user profiles creating a personalized experience 
   - Better location data to find the closest payout and send locations 
   - Revamped cash payment process 
   - Easily upload payment information with your camera 
   - Improved transfer tracking details 
   - Faster repeat transfers 
   - NEW reverse calculator functionality 
   - Plus, more to come

title: WorldRemit Money Transfer App: Send Money Abroad
description:
Send money internationally with WorldRemit. With low fees and upfront exchange rates, transfer money to friends and family overseas in over 150 countries using our money transfer app.

To get started, you can now use the code 3FREE and save the fees in your first three money transfers abroad.

Download the app now and save money and time in your international money transfer to more than 150 countries. It‚Äôs quick, simple and secure to use and in most cases your funds will be with family and friends in a matter of minutes. 

Using our money transfer app, you can also send money in a choice of ways including bank deposit, cash pickup, mobile money and airtime top-up.

Our app also comes with some very useful features. For example, it enables you to track your transactions, so you‚Äôll always know the exact status of your transfer.  

Send money fast all over the world
‚Ä¢	Using our app you can send money from 50 countries to recipients in 150 countries worldwide.

‚Ä¢	Depending on the destination you're sending to, you can choose whether your recipient gets the money via bank transfer, collects it in cash or receives it in their mobile money account 
‚Ä¢	Identify and track where your money is at all times 
‚Ä¢	Save your recipients to your contact list so you needn‚Äôt fill in their details every time 

Instant money transfers
We offer you one of the fastest ways to get your money in the hands of the person you are sending it to.

‚Ä¢	70% transfers sent via cash pickups are instant

Low cost transfers
‚Ä¢	We offer guaranteed exchange rates and you can choose to get daily notifications updates
‚Ä¢	Our low-cost fees are clearly displayed upfront
‚Ä¢	Use the code 3FREE üÜì to save all the fees on your first money transfers . This is just the start - every now and then we‚Äôll run other money-saving promotions. Watch this space‚Ä¶. 

Send money with confidence
‚Ä¢	More than 4 million customers trust us to send and receive money internationally

‚Ä¢	125,000+ 5‚≠êreviews from happy customers

Need to transfer? Here‚Äôs how it works:

Your family and friends can receive the money in their bank account, mobile wallet or pick up the cash at more than 500,000 locations in over 200 countries and territories.

comments: This app says that you can have money sent to your bank account and offered a promo code. But, the app itself did not have recieving money as an option not did it have transferring money to your bank account an option either. Also, when I wanted to put in verification to pick up money, it kept saying there were "Technical issues. Try again later ".

I found international transfers difficult and confusing at first. But now, having established regular friendships and having their info in this app? It is so easy to send them funds, and easy for them to pick up...And with the World in crisis now? I am so glad I can help them. Every little bit helps!!

It seems like there's always a problem. It either says that my address doesn't match or it wants me to enter another card. Calling "C.S." doesn't help. I don't like waiting for 45 minutes to an hour for someone who doesn't speak clear English. I'm very tired of WU garbage. It's time to look for a better way to send cash. I guess my friend and her family can go without rice/food until the quarantine is over. That's only a month. Thanks Western Union you really suck!!!

Good work WU. Needs a bit of fine tuning (bluetooth keyboard not working with app), entering middle name of recipient "re-enter surname" message. Click "send" first and second time and no dice (I noticed I did not click the agree to terms box). It works but could use help in the fine tuning.

The app is exceptional I have never had a problem with it and if I have any questions customer support is always there for meI highly recommend it to anyone that is going to send money anywhere in the US or overseas the only thing that I don't like about it is when they make that long speech about getting ripped off other than that it's a great app

title: 1Money - Expense Tracker, Money Manager, Budget
description:
The app will show you where your money is going. Keeping track of your finances frequently isn't the most pleasant thing in the world, and it requires specific skills and knowledge. That's why we've developed a program that will make it easy for you to track your expenses on the go.

‚Ä¢ ADD TRANSACTIONS INSTANTLY
Add a new transaction with a single tap. All you have to enter is the amount.

‚Ä¢ EXPENSES AT A GLANCE
Log every expenditure over the course of your day, and the app will show you where your money went on an informative chart.

‚Ä¢ BUDGET
You can quickly and easily plan your income and expenses, which will help you avoid making accidental purchases.

‚Ä¢ TRACK DEBTS AND SAVINGS
Keep an eye on the balances of all your accounts and reach your financial goals efficiently.

‚Ä¢ USE MULTIPLE CURRENCIES
Automatically updated exchange rates allow you to keep your finances up to date.

‚Ä¢ SYNCHRONIZATION
Track your finances on all of your devices simultaneously using cloud-based data synchronization.

recentChanges:
+ Account filter ‚Äì filter to display data for individual accounts (tap at the top of the screen)
+ Budget: Fixes for Savings
+ Refund transactions: Expenses/Income transactions with negative value
+ bug fixes...
comments: I loved it so much I bought the Premium version, which says a lot as I never pay for apps! I love the ability to customise categories, the pretty layout. One cool thing is that within a category, you can create subcategories, e.g."flights", "accomodation" in "travel" - that way, you don't have to type it every time, and you can also see how much is spent on what. There are lots of features that I'm not using, like being able to save your monthly records and print them. 100% üëç!

Nice application with attractive design, simple input and a great widget. However, there are 4 issues. (1) It lacks recurrence end date (2) the transaction has no time (hours & minutes), specially when it is required to sort transactions according to time during the same day (3) it will be great if each transaction shows the total balance along with each input for each account (not from starting & projected balance). (4) refund is reflected in the account not in categories amount or in overview.

Overall, I'm satisfied with the app, although I would like the developers to add a feature with which we can have a description added to the expense, for example the list of groceries, the destination, etc. We are able to add the descriptions, but they are not saved when the app is closed. For the time being I'm giving it four stars because of its functionality. I will give it five stars once the feature has been added. Keep up the good work!

Really really love this cool app! It covers all of my need in terms of tracking expense and salary. Obviously willing to subscribe. Easy to use, cool interface, and the experience fulfill my expectation. Cannot wait to use all of the functions. Great job team, keep going!

Love the flexibility of this app (particularly with the lifetime upgrade which was really inexpensive and totally worth it). I REALLY wish it had a web version so I could pull it up on my computer when I really need to dig into things. My favorite part might be the ability to customize the colors and pictures. It makes budgeting and tracking more enjoyable!

title: Ingo Money ‚Äì Cash Checks Fast
description:
CASH CHECKS AND GET YOUR MONEY IN MINUTES 
With the Ingo¬Æ Money App, cash paychecks, business checks, personal checks‚Äîalmost any type of check‚Äîanytime, anywhere. Get your money in minutes in your bank, prepaid card and PayPal accounts. Choose to pay credit card bills, buy an Amazon.com Gift Card* or split a check and fund multiple accounts. If your check is approved, the money is as good as cash and safe to spend on purchases and payments made in-store, online and in Android Pay. Terms and fees apply.

ENROLL, SNAP, GO!
It‚Äôs easy to get started. Create your Ingo Money profile right in the app and then link your bank debit card, prepaid card, PayPal account and credit cards. To cash your check, take a photo of the front and back and submit it for review. If your check is approved and your account is funded or your bill is paid, the money is guaranteed. No check cashing lines. No deposit holds. No take-backs. No worries.

With Ingo Money, it‚Äôs in with a check, and on with your life.
__________________________________________

* Restrictions apply. See details.

The Ingo Money App may be used by identity-verified customers to cash checks issued on U.S. financial accounts to fund: (1) most debit, prepaid and credit card accounts issued by hundreds of U.S. financial institutions including Chase¬Æ, Bank of America¬Æ, Citi¬Æ, Wells Fargo¬Æ, American Express¬Æ, U.S. Bank¬Æ, PNC Bank¬Æ, Capital One¬Æ, HSBC Bank USA, TD Bank, Discover¬Æ, Synchrony Bank, First Premier¬Æ Bank, MetaBank¬Æ and The Bancorp Bank; (2) PayPal‚Ñ¢, PayPal‚Ñ¢ for Business and PayPal‚Ñ¢ Prepaid MasterCard¬Æ accounts; (3) Amazon.com Gift Cards; and (4) most prepaid cards, including Chase Liquid¬Æ, Wells Fargo EasyPay¬Æ, Regions Now Card¬Æ, BB&T MoneyAccount¬Æ, NetSpend¬Æ, Green Dot¬Æ Prepaid Debit, Walmart MoneyCard¬Æ, H&R Block¬Æ Emerald Card¬Æ, ACE Elite‚Ñ¢, RushCard¬Æ, AccountNow¬Æ, Kroger¬Æ 1-2-3 REWARDS¬Æ and more. Funds may also be used to pay retail credit card bills from thousands of retailers including Walmart¬Æ, Target¬Æ, Costco¬Æ, Home Depot¬Æ, Lowe‚Äôs¬Æ, BestBuy¬Æ, Gap¬Æ and Old Navy¬Æ. You can also access the Ingo Money service in dozens of mobile banking apps including American Express Serve¬Æ and Bluebird by American Express. Ingo Money participates in the Visa¬Æ, MasterCard¬Æ, American Express¬Æ, Star¬Æ, Pulse¬Æ, NYCE¬Æ and Maestro¬Æ payment networks.

The Ingo Money service is provided by First Century Bank, N.A. and Ingo Money, Inc., subject to the First Century Bank and Ingo Money Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy. Approval review usually takes 3 to 5 minutes but can take up to one hour. All checks are subject to approval for funding in Ingo Money‚Äôs sole discretion. Fees apply for approved Money in Minutes transactions funded to your card or account. Unapproved checks will not be funded to your card or account. Ingo Money reserves the right to recover losses resulting from illegal or fraudulent use of the Ingo Money service.¬†Your wireless carrier may charge a fee for data usage.¬†Additional transaction fees, costs, terms and conditions may be associated with the funding and use of your card or account. See your Cardholder or Account Agreement for details.

¬© 2017 Ingo Money, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

comments: My experience with this app has been nothing but frustrating. They say I cant be identified and wont let me use it. Also been ignoring all my emails I sent trying to get this issue solved. I know it takes some time to respond.. I get that. But 5 days? Get out of here.. Your motto about caring for the customer or whatever is a joke.

After finishing the whole setup process, I tried to deposit a check through the app and it kept saying "unfortunately because we are unable to verify your identity, you cannot use the app." Like I don't understand, I had to give you my social security number and everything, I don't like this system at all!

Do not use! This is the worst app I have ever seen. At best it works 10 percent of the time. This is a poor reflection on pay pal because this the service they use. Same your self a lot of headaches just open a business account with your local bank you'll be a lot happier.

I signed up for this app to deposit my checks into my account. I used it a few times and paid the fees to have my $ in min... 2-22-2020 I wanted to do the same to a new bank card I have & did the process needed to deposit my check into my new card, as I took the picture of the front & back of my check, it got accepted & had to finish the process & wrote VOID on my check to comlplete the transaction.. Transaction didn't work & now I need a whole new check!! Stay clear & don't use this app!!

I have never had a bad experience. We used to use them twice a week to cash hand written per de um checks . Once we voided it and it said there was an issue so we called and it was fixed in 2 minutes! Now we use them for fidelity checks and what not. Thank you ingo

title: My Mobile Money Access
description:
It‚Äôs easy to manage your debit account and protect yourself from fraud with My Mobile Money Access.  When your financial institution offers the My Mobile Money Access app, you can set up your debit account, and then manage and monitor it wherever you go!  Our industry-leading technology enables YOU to control your card access without having to place a call to your financial institution‚Äôs customer support.  You can set up security measures right from your phone to help you avoid the hassles of account fraud.  

Your financial institution will determine which features are available for your specific account but they may include the following:

‚Ä¢  Balance inquiry ‚Äì Quickly check how much money you have in your account to avoid overdrafts.
‚Ä¢  Balance transfer ‚Äì Easily transfer funds between accounts associated with your debit card.
‚Ä¢  Ability to turn your card on and off ‚Äì Misplace your card?  Simply turn it off until you find it!
‚Ä¢  Ability to alert and deny transactions based on merchant type, location and transaction amount ‚Äì Protect your account from transactions you wouldn‚Äôt normally make.
‚Ä¢  Control other cards associated with the account ‚Äì If you have multiple cards, you can set controls for all associated cards.
‚Ä¢  Fraud alerts ‚Äì Receive alerts if a transaction is conducted using your account that is suspected of being fraudulent. 

Ask your financial institution how you can get set up with My Mobile Money Access today!

recentChanges: Change to verify apps error message
comments: Does not work at all. Will only accept required special character at beginning of password, the simply fails on login. Trying to reset the password, and it fails every time, no reason given. I can only conclude that this is some type of scam company that my bank has contacted with.

The app was great for a couple of months now it wont let me do nothing . I can't log in and i haven't changed nothing on it. Its all the same. And its saying now that its not recognizing my card. I uninstalled then installed again and its saying the same thing.

This app sucks, since I installed it I have 3 transactions that are fraudulent, and the app won't shut off my card. It keeps saying " unable to perform this action" then it says call this number. I called and it said call back when we're open. UH, HELLO YOUR APP SUCKS IT WON'T LET ME DO WHAT IT'S SUPPOSED TO DO. Come Monday I am cancelling my accounts and going to another bank.

This app has saved me multiple times with payment fraud. As soon as I make a payment with my bank card it is immediately picked up by this app and lets me know if there is any suspicious activity going on.

I love the instant alerts! I do wish I was able to transfer money from savings to checking. I love that they notify me every transaction that happens with my card. I like that I have an option to chose if a charge is fraudulent or not! Great app.

title: Dirty Money: the rich get richer!
description: This year it is time to squander your money as you please and to start living the high life. Although our simulator resembles its counterparts, your actions won't be limited to tap-tapping your screen all the time. Instead, you'll be deftly swiping up your dough as though out of a real fat wad of ruble bills, as you build up your business. Make your smartphone or tablet PC work really hard, and let it earn you piles of offline money! We offer you an engrossing offline action with a carefully thought-out and witty game plot. It works really fast even with no Internet connection. The simulator will brighten up your life when you languish in a long queue for your doctor, fly a long flight or ride a slow train. For it's never too boring to blow the money and effortlessly make a huge fortune! Owing to its intensity, eventfulness, and carefully thought-out plot, our game has been rated among "The Best 2018 Business Games". A seemingly simple task: tap for money and tap for riches and you win. But the game also teaches you how to forcefully win the market and fiercely fight with your competitors for fortunes! You'll be managing your capital, investing your finances, learning the art and craft of bribing and avoiding jail for it, and protecting yourself against racketeers. Power leveling of your business to unbelievable heights and incalculable incomes beyond your ken are waiting for you in our application. Get inspired to real-life successes by getting oodles of money and gold in the game. Become one of such heroes as Bill Gates, Steve Jobs and Donald Trump! Any quest you complete helps you dash your rivals' hopes. Download this game for free (gratis), and hurry up to earn some good money. To increase your wealth, aside from plain tap-tapping, you'll have to choose how to act in difficult situations. They are simulated so realistically that you feel like finding yourself in a real market. And if you want to become a big fish around there, you'll have to learn how to use your brains, that is to opportunely bribe corrupted officials, judges, and politicians, to protect yourself from bad cops and gangs of thugs, and not let your hard-earned fortune be plundered. Has your idle tycoon not pulled in his or her first long-cherished million yet? Establish your business from scratch, upgrade it, grasp and develop all the available opportunities, and if something strikes you as a bright new idea, then put your money in a reliable safe or invest it into your business, for the generous influx of cash to flow in. Prove to be the top millionaire or even billionaire of 2018 and amaze them all! By the way, the application allows you to compare your scores with those of your friends. You can challenge them to the game and see who become more powerful sooner, or tougher in coining it! Show them all that you are a money hunter, sick with gold rush and ready for money wars. Imagine that you are in charge of the Rich Company, Inc. and become a capitalist watching his empire's incremental evolution.The game will help you loosen up at the end of your hard working day at the office, just munch your cookies and swipe it up till you feel you're just about losing your hand as it has grown totally numb! Just take it, you'll forget everything that has been worrying you throughout your day, by turning smaller bills into larger ones and creating more and more revenues. No risks, just a great pleasure from creating your own huge empire. Do you want to download the game and have some bright piece of entertainment offline? Hurry to press the download button, and in a minute you'll be engrossed in the action-packed gaming experience! Dirty Money is an awesome clicker game with upgrades and power leveling, which is available entirely in English! Get Dirty Money for your Android gadget for free, and make your money tree be always money-laden and your pockets be full of cash! P.S. Still reading this description? You should've been playing it already!

comments: It's a cool game to pass the time when ur avoiding something, bored or just wanna feel like a rich superstar that's having fun making if rain on ur imaginary friends, family and fab fans. The reason why I didn't hey give total stars is because I hate when I'm tapping/sliding and it doesn't actually let me make it rain and it stays in place for a bunch of slides because then I start sliding my fingers all over my phone frantically like a wild person lol. But other than that love this game to bits

An extremely annoying amount of forced ads. Even if you click to watch ads yourself, they'll force you to watch one anyway like every minute or so. Would be a great time killer if it wasn't for the many forced ads...
Forced add galore. Lots and lots of forced ads. Only way to play is in airplane mode.
Game is really good, i like the graphics and the game in general. Really good 5/5 would recomend!! üòäüòä
Really awesome doesn't take long to get cash rewards

title: Digit: Save Money With Your Debt & Savings Manager
description:
Save Money Automatically.
Want to save money and build your savings stress-free? Manage finances, create customized savings goals, and pay off credit cards or student loans with Digit, your personal savings and debt manager. 

Your savings manager helps you to automatically save a little bit of money each day, based only on what you can afford. Make keeping a budget and rounding up your spare change things of the past. Plus, you can manage finances easily so that you‚Äôre saving money without even thinking about it.

Pay Off Debt Without Breaking a Sweat.
Save cash and pay off debt, like student loans or credit card bills. Your finance manager knows the right amount of money to add to your Digit savings account, making it easier to pay off bills in time. So you avoid any late fees. By saving in small increments, you can pay bills and manage your financial goals in no time. 

Manage Your Finances Intelligently.
Digit learns your spending and income patterns, putting aside the right amount. Don‚Äôt round up spare change, instead, your Digit money-saving strategy means a little bit goes straight into your Digit Savings Account so you can pay off debt and manage your financial goals intelligently.

Reach Savings Goals Quickly.
Saving money is easy with our smart money management approach. You‚Äôre automatically saving the right amount for you, and only what you can afford. You can save money and pay off debt like student loans and credit card bills, even on a budget. We‚Äôre your money management guide, helping you to reach your financial goals quickly.

Boost Your Financial Health.
Need to pay off student loans, credit card bills, or budget your savings for a much-needed vacation? Manage finances intelligently with text alerts on your spending and automatic savings added to your Digit Savings Account. So you know where you stand against your financial goals at all times.

Join the financial revolution that's saved members over 2.5 billion dollars! Featured in Business Insider, Elle, Bustle, Money Peach, US News, and much more! Digit is an intelligent money management solution that helps you boost your financial health.

MONEY SAVING FEATURES.
‚Üí Save money easily with your personal savings manager. And manage finances every day based on your income and spending.
‚Üí Digit‚Äôs automatic money management app intelligently analyzes your finances so you know how much money you can save.
‚Üí Use your spare change for emergency funds or other customized savings goals.
‚Üí Save cash and budget for an unlimited number of financial goals, with recommended timelines for achieving them.
‚Üí Avoid overdraft fees. Turn on overdraft prevention and automatically transfer money from your savings to checking when your balance gets too low.
‚Üí Withdraw your money as often as you like. No fees for standard ACH withdrawals and no minimums.
‚Üí Your savings manager helps you earn 1% annually on your Digit savings. That's 11X more than an average savings account!¬π
‚Üí Digit uses the same security standards as many banks so you know that your funds and personal information are secure.
‚Üí FDIC-insured banks maintain your Digit savings, insured up to a balance of $250,000.

--------------------------------------------------------

Digit is completely free to try for 30 days. After your trial period, a monthly subscription costs $5 and can be canceled anytime. Whether you want to pay off student loans or credit card bills, build up your savings account or put away some spare change, at Digit, we‚Äôve got your back.

1. FDIC National Savings Rates, as of 12-23-19 https://www.fdic.gov/regulations/resources/rates/historical/2019-12-23.html

summary: Your personal finance manager helps you save money & pay off debt intelligently
comments: The balance updates are a day behind. That delay doesnt lend itself to the balance threshold feature. By the time digit realizes that my balance fell, j have already addressed it. For goals, it would be helpful to set a time frame to reach the goal. For example, if I am saving for a trip. I want to be able to tell digit that I want to save X amount in the next 6 months. Then digit can save more aggressively according to the goal and time frame set.

You privacy policy is all over the place. It is so crazy how you use our data. No wonder you have your app all over the web as ads. Why would you need our computer crash reports? I feel like this app doesn't have our best interests at heart. üíî People, make sure you look at the turns of service and privacy policy before joining any app. Not even my bank has so many clauses about taking your data and using in the way it says. (Update: Check out you BBB then! It's quite damning.)

The best app for "sneaky saving"! I'm trying to pay off debt and any extra money I can put towards it helps so much. I love that I don't really have to stress over finding extra money because this app does it for me. I really love how you can establish a savings priority making it possible to save for a rainy day and make an extra payment to your credit card.

I have only joined Digit for about 4 days now. I assumed it saves money from your direct deposits on payday. I get paid weekly and Digit has already pulled from my account twice. Why?? I tried to explore the app for how it actually works, but it's not much help. I do appreciate the convienence of it saving automatically, just not back to back. Is there a schedule I can set or is this how it works? If not I might have to delete this app.

Do not use. They over drafted my account twice and have yet to pay me back for the money plus the over draft fees. They actually want me to reconnect my bank account so they can deposit money back into my account üòÇüòÇ after providing them with my address to send the check to they refused and said I had to attach my account. Currently calling my bank to deal with it. Save yourself the "hurdles" (this is the word the rep used in the email to discrible the situation and steps I had to take)...üò°

title: Ria Money Transfer ‚Äì Send Money Online Anywhere
description:
Downloading the Ria Money Transfer app gives you access to our 369,000+ locations worldwide in the palm of your hand. Our enhanced mobile experience makes it easy to select a preferred way to send money with the best exchange rates available. Plus, with our ever-expanding network, the funds are transferred conveniently to friends or family via bank deposit, cash, or home delivery.  

Why use Ria Money Transfer for your money-sending needs? We can think of a few reasons! 

Speed and Convenience
Say goodbye to the days of carrying around checks or cash, and wiring money. With Ria's mobile app you can send money right from your couch! Ria strives to provide an expedited money transfer process. Funds reach their destination in as little as 15 minutes. Additionally, repeat transfers are now faster than ever! Just swipe a finger, and your money is on its way.

Easy to Use
Our newly-improved application makes sending money easier than ever. The modernized visual design, versatile functionality, and intuitive money-transfer process were built with your comfort and experience in mind. Try it out and let us know what you think!

Secure and Reliable
We know it‚Äôs stressful to send money, so our priority is to help users feel secure sending with Ria. We‚Äôve been in the money-transfer business for over 30 years and know what it takes to keep your information, and money, protected. With over 1 billion transfers securely sent, your money is safe with us.

Great Exchange Rates and Low Fees
At Ria, we want you to get the best rates! Our Check Prices Calculator allows for easy rate comparisons and helps find the most-affordable way to send money to loved ones.

New Features
We‚Äôre excited to announce these highly-anticipated features:
   - Completely redesigned application 
   - Clean, easy-to-use user interface 
   - Smoother transitions and clear steps to complete a money transfer 
   - Improved functionality of the Price Calculator 
   - Comprehensive user profiles creating a personalized experience 
   - Better location data to find the closest payout and send locations 
   - Revamped cash payment process 
   - Easily upload payment information with your camera 
   - Improved transfer tracking details 
   - Faster repeat transfers 
   - NEW reverse calculator functionality 
   - Plus, more to come

Ria is committed to providing an outstanding customer experience. We appreciate your feedback and have made changes to better serve you. Thanks for sending with Ria!
comments: Their "computer glitches" have caused me more than a headache for the last month or two. DO NOT USE THIS HORRIBLE COMPANY. If you value piece of mind and your $$$ I highly discourage anyone from installing. Even when you un-link your bank account from the app, they still manage to take funds without notice or remorse.

Ria website says I can send cash with 7-Eleven and pay $15. It tells me to download the app. Meanwhile, the app doesn't provide an option to choose cash and it wants to charge $83 for the same transfer. It's also painfully slow. The date/time picking carousel animation is so unresponsive and made poorly you can't properly insert your birthdate without the animation automatically rolling the digit to the next digit on the carousel.
Not safe. It saves your questions answers. You can‚Äôt use it to send money. Finally I know why. I had to use the laptop to send money. Do not make an app. You update it and made it worst
Best Rates and fast delivery! App and web can be improved in terms of UI and UX.
After an update both app and website don't want to take an ID from Chile it keeps telling the number is wrong..

title: Money Manager: Track expense & budget bookkeeping
description:
Money Manager is a simple, practical and perfect bookkeeping app to help you record day to day financial transaction. Learn where you spend the money most with the assistance of our budget system could help you control the spending and savings more money. This bookkeeping app is not only just an account book to help you record your daily expense & income but there is also more feature to help easily track and manage all kind of financial stuff to make the process of bookkeeping easier.

Money Manager makes managing finance as easy as pie! You could separate your work, family, personal finance with different account. Beside, you could customise the category depend on your personal needs. Don't like the old one? Delete it and create new one! 

With this expense tracker, you can control your expense with budget and save more to reach specific financial goal. 

Some of the key feature:

- Total balance
Automatically calculate the total balance of all your wallet since the day you using this bookkeeping app so you don't have to see the amount of the wallet anymore. 

 - View transaction and balance based on date
Get to know how much you earn or spend daily, weekly, monthly, yearly or even between two date to help you save the time perform calculation on the account book manually.

 - Multiple account
Separate and manage work, personal, family with different account. You can have as many account as you like.

 - Multiple wallet
Track cash flow from different bank, card, e-wallet, cash etc.
 
 - Flexible category
Adapt the category based on your needs. Beside, fill your account book(Money Manager) with different colour to make it look fantastic.

 - Statistic
Get insight about what you spend & earn based on the category

 - Budget
Add a budget to remind yourself do not expense over the budget range

 - Savings goal
Challenge yourself by set a goal and see wether you can achieve it on the expected date

 - Debt
Record and remind yourself every transaction you owe to someone

 - Password
Protect your record with 4-digit password 

- Search feature
Easily find back your expense/income record with search functionality

-Export to CSV/Excel file
Backup or print the record by exporting into CSV or Excel file

Regardless you are in accounting field or just want to do great in financial management, this bookkeeping app will be benefit you from one or more ways. Now you can be your own accountant even without single account book.

¬© 2018 Ktwapps. All right reserved.

comments: Hello! I am here to send feedback regarding the use of your app. After my phone got upgraded to Android 10, all of my new expense entries with photos, DOESN'T SHOW THE PHOTOS BEING ATTACHED. It is attached by just a gray picture. Is there any incompatibility issues going on? Thank you. Have a nice day.

So far, so great! I love how simple and user-friendly this app is. Despit being simple, it has all the basic wallet management and organization tools I was looking for in other apps. I'm currently thinking of upgrading to premium. May I ask, what are the perks? PS. I think there is a mixup with the " I Borrow" and the "I Lend" feature under Debt. Shouldnt it be - if I choose "I Borrow" then the tracker should display Paid and Remaining/Balance. Other than that, everything is perf. üòç

Total convenience! I like the easy, understandable & colourful interface, encourage me to update my expenses everyday without fail. One improvement for this app would be adding the 'note' section for each item in the expenses record. (currently have 5: category, amount, date, wallet & type). For example if we choose 'shopping', we can roughly list down in the 'note' section what we actually buy. All in all, it's a great app !

The app is good but still needs many things to make it user friendly. If you need to input something in past days, you have to open the date as many times as the items you are inputting. Words that is used often should be remembered. I have been using Expense Manager by Bishinews for years and it's so convenient to use.

Very satisfied even with free version! You can add more than 3 wallet, add more category of expenses and income. This is what I need. The UI are very simple, clean and informative. I think I should buy the pro version for more features. But even in free version you still get the features that you need. Thank you.

title: EXCEED by Money Network
description:
The EXCEED by Money Network¬Æ Mobile App* is a convenient and secure way to keep track of your money on the go. The app is available to Walmart associates who receive their pay via the Money Network Service, and Secondary Cardholders** (family members or dependents 14+ years or older). The app is free*** to download and gives you more control of your money with 24/7 access to your account information anytime, anywhere!"
Key Features**:
‚Ä¢ Quick View to see balances without login

recentChanges: Bug Fix
comments: I am very dissatified with this app and money network. The app is not allowing me to transfer the funds from my piggy bank to the main account so that I may have access to my funds. Then when you call the customer service number, they don't have the process to cancel the piggy bank without calling their back end which is not open 24/7. That is not good customer service. How does your app offer a service that does not work. I hope you guys fix the problems with your app.

The experience has been OK but trying to reach customer support when you can't get the automated system to accept your card/SS number is terrible. I can't talk to no one because it keeps saying my card isn't registered when I've been using it for the past month. HELP!

At first, when it was changed to EXCEED by Money Network, I liked it. I didn't have to wait for a verification code to be sent to check my account...it was great!! Now....now it's starting up again. Asking me to wait for a verification code to be sent out to verify that it's me....I mean once in a while, okay fine - I can live with that. But not EVERY TIME!!! So annoying....got me thinking about changing where I do my banking/deposits....fix this please!!

I wish there was a negative star rating.. I used to like this app until today!!! Now I have to have a code sent to me before I can look at my very own transactions. It used to have it so you could sign in using your finger print but now it won't even recognize that and makes you sign in anyway and make you have a code sent to you before you can sign in. I even uninstalled and reinstalled the app thinking that would make a difference but not a chance!!! It's BS!!!!!
When I can actually login, it works, it work but today it's trash, I was at the register and wasn't able to login to transfer money, so I had to cancel order

title: Tip Yourself - Save Money, Get Motivated
description:
Save money! Finally, a saving money app that's actually fun. Reward yourself and save money for life's little moments of victory. 

How do you save money? The secret is habits and mindset. Get motivated today!

‚àö Male it to the gym?... 
‚àö Skip an impulse purchase?... 
‚àö Make a healthy food choice?... 
‚àö Got that long todo list completed?... 

Heck, for no reason at all? You Earned it!... Tip Yourself!

HOW IT WORKS
******************************************
Tip Yourself allows you to transfer small dollar amounts from your checking account into your own secure savings Tip Jar. 

It's FUN. It's EASY. There are ABSOLUTELY NO FEES
******************************************
Use Tip Yourself as a Vacation Fund, a Rainy-day Savings Fund, or to just to Reward Yourself!! 

WHAT THE EXPERTS ARE SAYING
******************************************
LifeHacker: "Tip Yourself Is Like a Virtual Savings Jar!"

Oprah.com: "Finally quit smoking? Hit the gym early? Why not tip yourself?"

REAL SIMPLE: "Tip Yourself lets you create personal challenges, large and small (such as paying off your car or saving $20 on coffee in a week). It adds up"

Mental Floss: "Essentially, it‚Äôs a goal-tracking and savings app in one"

START TODAY
******************************************
Download today and start saving money! Tip Yourself! You Earned it!

recentChanges: We made some bug fixes and performance improvements. We're excited to share some more exciting updates with you soon! #TipYourself #YouEarnedit
comments: This app really does help save money! I log in each pay week and just add a little something. With preset options or the ability to customize the amount, it's easy to tap a couple buttons and know you've accomplished a goal! Negatives would be that it does kick you out and will occasionally crash. Otherwise I really enjoy it!

Update 3/03/2020: I had to contact customer service several times to find out why my money from my closer account wasn't transferred. Also my paper check from an earlier withdrawal. After the 3rd time (yesterday) I got it today electronically.

Only been using 2 days, but so far it I love it. Everything seams to work smoothly and I really get the feeling that it is a well run company/organization. For example, their membership is completely reasonable at $9.99/year! Also when signing up, there was given the option to auto-renew annually, but it is turned OFF by default. How many other subscription model companies show such obvious and meaningful care for their customers? This is so helpful for me to save money, I'm happy to pay $9.99.

I deleted all my tip jars over a month ago and money is still being taken out of my account. I deleted my bank information on the app in addition to the tip jars, $5 was still taken out and now I can't log back in to withdraw the money üò† If you want money stolen, download the app.

Nice. Takes awhile for the micro transactions to come through. Had problems logging in for a moment, but that cleared up once my internet connection was restored. Happy this is free. Overall pretty good app. So far; trusted. Edit: still a good app, keeping the 3 stars. But I am having 1 problem. 1 of my tip jars started acting up. I had to cancel the pending transfer for $1; I pressed withdraw, jar tipped upside down, & got stuck. Transfer went through, now idk where my money is. Please fix..

title: Send money online: card to card
description:
Paysend: Global money transfers 

The Paysend money transfer app is fast, simple and secure, allowing you to make card-to-card transfers to any Visa, MasterCard or Union Pay card, and to regular bank accounts in 80+ countries. We‚Äôre on a mission to change how money is moved around the world.

We charge a low, flat fee of only ¬£1, $2 or 1.50‚Ç¨ for international money transfers regardless of the amount sent ‚Äì so more of your money will reach your destination. 

Paysend is trusted by over 1.5 Million users as their money transfer method of choice. Download the app now and start living a life of money without borders. 

Benefits of using Paysend to transfer money: 

‚Ä¢ Low, fixed fees 
‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use app 
‚Ä¢ Speedy transfers 
‚Ä¢ Excellent rates 
‚Ä¢ Safe and secure 

How can we help you? 

Paysend takes the hassle out of money transfers. 

This means no more cash, no more complicated forms to complete, no more sort codes, no more queuing, and no more long trips to pick up the transfer. Our app allows users to send and receive money in the comfort of their own phone. 

Paysend will give you visibility over the exchange rate, the transfer fee (only ¬£1, $2 or 1.50‚Ç¨, depending on where you are), and the amount that will be received before you transfer money. 

Say no to hidden fees, slow delivery and over-complicated money transfers by downloading the Paysend app now!
 
About Paysend 

Paysend is the trading name of Paysend plc, registered in Scotland, United Kingdom. The company number is 376020. Our registered office is at Cluny Court John Smith Business Park, Kirkcaldy, Fife, KY2 6QJ. Paysend plc is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA), number 900004. 

Paysend is a registered ‚ÄòVisa Direct‚Äô and ‚ÄòMastercard MoneySend‚Äô originating institution. All ‚Äòtransactions‚Äô and ‚Äòdata‚Äô are secured at the highest PCI DSS level 1 standards.

title: Unclaimed Money
description:
