comments: I have been using the app for a few days now. Quite interesting the way the report of my spending and savings is showed. I do like the app so far, however, there's one big mistake in my opinion. What is the purpose of the password/finger lock option if when I go to the manage apps screen I can still see some personal information (as if I were on the main screen before switching apps for example)? I wish the screen was blank on the app manager screen just like Google Chrome do when you're using incognito windows. If the developers could add this to the next update would be great :)

Love using this app. It it very user friendly and you can categorize everything to your liking. I chose to pay extra for the "Plus" plan which allows more budgets... I like that I can have multiple budgets for different things like bills, vehicle, groceries etc. The notifications it gives me when im getting close to my budget or went over budget helps me keep on track. Wish there was a way to set up something other than a wallet for a credit card for example.

I have started my free trial but have yet to be able to connect to my bank to even give this app a try. Everytime I try it gives me a screen after my password that says "please select the contact information you want to use to log in". Then a line, like I'm supposed to know what that is. I've tried entering "text, "mobile" my phone #, " "cell". Until I try a few times & it wont even let me connect again. I'd like to try it but cant even get past the 1st part

Overall - nice but very buggy. I am using Spendee Plus plan and at some point it stopped synchronizing shared wallets. Every new transaction or edit causes an uninformative error message to pop up. Tapping on "Contact customer support" offers you to send a message to one of your contacts via any available messenger, the message is "Need your help". Seems like the users are supposed to help themselves...

Tried Premium, but it wouldn't reconnect to my bank account with Halifax after the first day of setting up the app. I tried contacting technical support but never got a reply, only loads of spam emails. Can't understand how this is a paid subscription when the app doesn't work and there is no attempt to fix the connection issues. Edit- thanks for the quick response, I sent the email through the help button on your Web app. I also filled in a form sent to me by email about bank connection issues

title: Premise - Take Photos Earn Money
description:
Earn money by completing simple tasks and get paid! Share an opinion or take photos in and around your city to earn cash rewards through PayPal or Bitcoin.

Premise is a task marketplace app that helps you earn money for simple tasks. Take paid surveys, share local information like construction zones or the price of milk, and share pictures of your city to earn cash rewards. Making money with Premise really is that simple.

Premise‚Äôs tasks feature local questions and surveys relevant to your city. Get cash for sharing information important to you and the people in your neighborhood ‚Äì it‚Äôs like getting paid for doing a public service!

Premise‚Äôs task marketplace is always growing, which means there are tasks for everyone. Earn money every day by sharing your local knowledge as a Premise Contributor.

Take surveys for money, share local information and earn with Premise ‚Äì download now!

PREMISE FEATURES

MAP YOUR COMMUNITY
- Get cash while you capture what‚Äôs happening in your community.
- Earn rewards for sharing insights that reflect your reality, your thoughts and your community.
- Make real money sharing information relevant to your city, from traffic jams to local events to supermarket sales.

EARN REAL MONEY
- Earn money from tasks and photos.
- Choose tasks that fit your lifestyle based on how much time you have.
- Earn more when you do more!

SHARE YOUR OPINION
- Get paid for your insights - your opinion matters.
- Paid surveys for organizations and community leaders that value your feedback. 
- Premise makes it easy to capture and share your thoughts.

MAKE AN IMPACT
- Earn real money by sharing real data to drive real change.
- Join Premise‚Äôs growing network of thousands of Contributors around the world.
- Complete tasks every day to help make policies, products or services better for everyone.

Earn money by sharing local information, your opinions and survey answers with Premise today!

Task availability is based on the needs of organizations we are working with and can change frequently.

Thank you for being a Premise Contributor!

Need help? E-mail support@premise.com
Learn more about being a Premise Contributor: www.premise.com/contributors

comments: I had nothing but good things to say about this app, until it started having issues with the payment methods. You will get the same copied and pasted response from their "support". If they give you a time frame of when it'll be "fixed", you'll be able to cash out, but it doesn't last long because the next time you try to cash out their system is down again. If they would get this payment issue fixed, for good, they'll get the 5 stars they deserve, but this payment issue is ridiculous.

I love the idea if this app and how you get to make a little money while having fun......... BUT....I have over 10 failed attempts if cashing out and have yet too been able to cash out....if a mgt other users have had similar problems please let me know....I've complained to there "report a problem" over 5 times and everytime I get asked to be patient and wait 72 hours when its been close top a month now?????? Somehow HELP I was really excited another this app my daughter loved doing it with me

Was waiting for first payout to rate the app. Just received $20 payment. An app error prevented payouts for a few days but was fixed quickly and payout arrived at my PayPal account instantaneously. Super easy to earn money. The surveys, while only paying 10¬¢ a piece, are super short and there's no answering 10 or more minutes worth of qualifying questions only to be disqualified like the other survey apps out there. Join Premise, you won't regret it!
Installed the app and made an account without issues. I completed a bunch of tasks and now when I should be about to cash out, I can not log in, I can't connect? One star until this is fixed.

Great at first welcome bonus was $6.50.,seem like i reach $10 fairly easy and was able to cash that small amout out.now they have reduce the pay dramadicly. Also increased pay pal cash out. Legit pay. For snapping pics. Basically places I travel past daily. Can make $ 5-10 daily. My husband cashed out at $40 .

comments: Bad gaming experience. This game provides "boosters" to "help" you through out your game. However. This game incorporates adds in between your games while your boosters are on timers. Guess what keeps ticking down while you're watching that add? You got it. Your booster that's supposed to help you. When you have a booster that is only 5 minutes long and you run into three 30 second adds in less than 5 minutes you can bet it's not really there to help you, but to keep you playing like a gambler.
Ha didnt even get to play. Apparently my email is not valid and i use it everyday. In fact i have had the same email for over 25 years. If i have this much trouble from the start why bother

It keeps saying email already registered but i never signed up before. So when i entermy email and hit forgot password it says that they are going to send me a email to reset my password but it never happens

Its constant play where as other games are like scratch watch and score watch ad double score watch ad . It takes so long for each move I get bored and quit other games . This is great. Not boring food music and images . I didn't know what I was doing at first but with no instructions I caught in . Love it

Now keep a track on your income, expenses and savings with My Manager App. Attractive graphs to reflect your income and savings which can actually help to track and get smart in terms of saving your hard earned money.
Savings is what everyone craves for; however, every month end, we brainstorm our minds and question ourselves, where all my income went?

Now you will know where it went and can get smart and know more about the unnecessary expenses which we had been spending but didn‚Äôt pay attention to.


Best way to manage and track your expenses and spending.

Get More information

Please visit our website : http://www.ydoodle.com


Feedbacks and suggestions:

We‚Äôd love to hear from you!!
Send us your feedbacks : info@ydoodle.com

‚òÖ Features ‚òÖ
---------------

- helps you track your spending quickly and easily

comments: Its a user friendly app and i am easily able to track my expenses, but one request i would like to make as suggestion as please incorporate filters for Transactions on category basis, so that exactly the cost as per category incurred throughout the month can be assessed and analysed easily. If its done then the app is definitely worth for 5 star plus ratings. I have been using the app from last 18 months. A big Thanks to the entire team.

I found this app very useful to monitor my daily expenses. But it needs some improvements.request to the developers... 1. Saved money from previous month should automaticaly carry forward to the current month. Otherwise, money on hand vs money on app doesn't match right. 2. Catagory which is used in transaction couldn't be updated/renamed.please solve this. 3. Need an id profile in the app to backup all the info online, incase the phone gets lost/broken taking down the offline backup & the app.

This app is nice...we can export the entry in pdf format...some other apps don't provide this option free (only available with premium option)...but one thing this app doesn't have budjet creating option..
Hello, Application is simple and attractive, I'm enjoying using it... But i just want to say that the summary of income should be shown separately...

The app is awesome, but it will more more awesome if the backup can be done online to prevent loss of data when one changes phone or misplaces his or her phone. This will really help the user. Please do that ASAP.

title: Steady - Find Work. Earn Money
description:
Install Steady for FREE today and join our community of over a million users.

Steady is here to help you look after your financial health - from matching you with opportunities to make Extra Money, to providing you an income tracker to monitor your earnings, to ensuring you have the benefits you need while you work.

We want to inspire and connect our members to extra income opportunities. Discover and share ways to increase your earnings and motivate others to do the same. We want you to focus more on your future making money. So how do we do that?

*We are constantly adding new extra income opportunities.
And every new job posting is a new opportunity for you to make more money.

*We know that finding extra income is time-consuming.
The Steady app helps you search and filter extra income opportunities that meet your financial needs, your availability and your skill set.

*We help you tackle your financial goals.
Steady‚Äôs Income Tracker lets you focus on what you are earning and understand where your money is coming from rather than just keeping an eye on what you‚Äôre spending.

*We want to inspire you to not only increase your earnings but feel motivated by the progress.
There are a variety of reasons people look for extra income. For some, it is a long-term plan to free themselves from unwanted debt. For others, it is more short-term, looking for extra income to pay for a vacation or fund a child‚Äôs school trip.

Download Steady for FREE today. Create your account, find work and make extra money alongside the Steady workers who are changing the way Americans work and live. The goal of the Steady community is to help you find new jobs, make extra money, get stronger financially and feel motivated by the progress.

To learn more about Steady- our team, our vision, and our accomplishments visit https://www.steadyapp.com. Have more questions or need a helping hand? Please email us at help@steadyapp.com.

recentChanges:
We are excited to introduce the Financial Stability Plan! Create your personalized plan in under two minutes and start your journey to increase your income and improve your financial health. Financial stability may seem like it‚Äôs out of reach, but it doesn‚Äôt have to be. Steady is here to help.

Just as much as we want to help you, we‚Äôd love for you to help us. Please send suggestions and feedback to help@steadyapp.com.
comments: The app itself has worked pretty sufficiently. But Steady is an awesome concept. I have already received $50 in gift cards from "Income Boosters" and it has encouraged me to start doing food deliveries. I'd say the only downfall, though very small, is that they can change the amount you're rewarded at anytime, even if you're in the middle of completing a booster task. But other than that, I've had no problems with the app and they reward exactly as promised. Pretty large amounts might I add. :)

The boosters are awesome! They pay them the 1st and 15th of each month, so you may not receive them immediately, but they add up. Not the most effective for finding a full time position, (WHICH I'm still on the hunt for) but it's a lovely app to make some cash on the side. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to get some extra cash, as it is a lot more effective than filling out surveys online

I have had the best experience using this app! I received a $40 Visa card in my email from Steady as soon as I completed my 1st Instacart shop. I actually had completely forgotten about the Income Booster & it was such a great surprise!!! Thank you so much Steady!!! I recommend this app to everyone, it's awesome!!!

Ok listing of leads and side gigs, but nothing new or that you don't get from a quick Google search. Don't waste your time with the 'Income Boosters', they always find a way around paying. A test with 4 different users tried 2 boosters each and none were paid, for various obscure reasons. Users stuck with consequences/memberships/accounts.

As an app to help identify new opportunities this is well done. However I fail to see why my banking sign in credentials are required to complete setup. Routing and account number to set up direct deposit, hey no problem. But I'll be damned if I'm handing over access to my money to anyone.

title: TransferWise Money Transfer
description:
Send money abroad quickly and easily, at the lowest possible cost with TransferWise. Hold and convert your money in 28 currencies. And always get the real exchange rate. 

TransferWise uses the real exchange rate to help expats, foreign students, businesses, freelancers and people living international lives to send, receive, and spend money ‚Äî securely, conveniently, and at a very low cost.

¬∑  Send money abroad ‚Äî it‚Äôs up to 8x cheaper than high street banks, and you‚Äôll always get the real exchange rate.
¬∑  Get a free multi-currency account ‚Äî hold and manage your money in multiple currencies, and convert it when the rate is right. 
¬∑  Trusted by millions ‚Äî just look us up on Google or Facebook to see our happy reviews. We‚Äôre fully regulated, so your money‚Äôs safe and secure. 

Use TransferWise to:
- Send money to a family member abroad.
- Send money to a friend
- Pay a bill in another country.
- Pay off your mortgage or loan abroad
- Hold and manage your money in 28 currencies
- Get paid in multiple currencies (AUD, GBP, EUR, USD), without any fees

recentChanges: We fixed some bugs and made improvements to make the app work better.
comments: Problems with the transfer via Trustly. Ongoing for months. Have to cancel and then redo the transfer several times before it works. No help from customer service despite several attempts. Strange that you "cleaned" up my account and deleted all the cancellations on 19/3/2030 that I had to do over the last 6 months?? P2505253 Once the ongoing problem is solved, I will certainly be happy to give 5 stars!

After 2 months using the app, I can say this. The exchange rate is good and gets close to the mid -market rate. But not quite which is somewhat deceptive. The transfer fees for ACH transfers however are excessive. I have banks that charge zero fees for ACH transfers, so what's the big deal. Some Apps have loyalty discounts that help to lower these fees, TransferWise does not. I'm looking into alternative exchanges and I sure one will come along to under it at some point.

Closure of accounts happen for no apparent reasons and its something they do when they feel like doing it without factual reasons. The client service is awful especially when your account has been deactivated. It takes them more than enough days to respond on your email. I rate Monese client service experience far much sufficient to TransferWise. I wouldn't be here if i had recouped my balance and received a factual reason on why my account was shut off.

1. Why transfer comments can be only in english? It's stupid. 2. The website is really so basic. You could make it look a bit more professional, you want people to trust you right? 3. The transfer process is still too complex. Why do you have step 4 and 5 separately? There is no helpline anywhere. Suddenly the option to pay with debit card disappeared..

The transaction was simple but only to realise that the credit transaction was a cash advance which cost me more in the end. So zero net saving. After realizing what had happened and reading more about it, the details are hidden. Would have helped if a warning popped up when credit card option is selected. So the lower rating is for not informing me clearly as it would be difficult to know without a warning. It was too late for me to reverse this transaction into my debit account/card.

title: Dosh: Save money & get cash back when you shop
description:
Earn cash rewards when you shop with Dosh and get cash back by shopping on items you already buy. Plus you can get money for shopping, eating and booking hotels. 

Get money back when you shop and dine at the places you visit every week including Wendy‚Äôs, Uber, Old Navy, Gap, Grubhub, Home Depot, Walgreens, Forever 21, Sephora, and more! From your favorite restaurant to retail store, earning cash back with Dosh couldn‚Äôt be easier. You can even get cash back when you make a hotel booking with your debit or credit card.

Dosh automatically gets you cash back whenever you shop at your favorite retail stores, restaurants and book hotels. Enjoy cash rewards, exclusive shopping deals and watch your cash savings increase every time you use your linked card on everyday items.

Whether you want to eat out at your favorite restaurant, search for some shopping deals or build on your cash savings, Dosh helps you put money back in your pocket. Shopping deals, cash savings, deals and more!

Five reasons you‚Äôll love using Dosh to earn cash back:

1. Pay with your credit card and get cash back - Securely link your credit and debit cards and whenever you pay with your linked cards, Dosh gets you cash back.

2. Cash rewards and money back whenever you shop, and dine out - Pay with your linked debit or credit card at thousands of stores, and restaurants, and get cash back automatically in your Dosh Wallet.

3. Cash back when you book a hotel globally - Pay with your linked card at thousands of hotels worldwide and get up to 40% cash back in your Dosh Wallet.

4. Mobile offers are here - Open the Dosh app, find your favorite brands, tap Shop from the app to launch the brand website (or app) and do your shopping. When you‚Äôre done check out and get your cash back!



5. Use your cash rewards however you want - Transfer your cash to bank accounts, Venmo, PayPal, or even donate to charity from the app! With Dosh, you get cold, hard cash to spend anyway you like.

FEATURES:

- Get cash back automatically - Unlike other cash back apps, there‚Äôs no need to cut out retail coupons, scan receipts, or remember restaurant discount codes. Through secure debit and credit card connection, Dosh automatically finds existing offers or shopping deals, redeems them, then puts the cash savings into your Dosh Wallet. From a hotel booking to a deal at your favorite restaurant let Dosh help you earn cash back the easy way!

- Choose from thousands of brands & merchants - Dosh is available at thousands of retail stores, restaurants, and hotels with new offers added every day like Wendy‚Äôs, Uber, Old Navy, Gap, Grubhub, Home Depot, Walgreens, Forever 21, Sephora, and more! You can even earn cash back on a hotel booking - so what are you waiting for? 

- Refer friends & family - Get paid for each friend who signs up with your referral code. When you share Dosh with people you love, it‚Äôs like putting cash right into their pockets.

LOVE DOSH?

Please take a moment to review our app! Your feedback is our greatest asset‚Äîespecially when that means helping more people get cash back.

Download Dosh now and get paid to do the things you already do!

comments: Cant access my account because wont let me reset my password, keeps saying error message. Not making a new one so good riddance.
I'll give more stars when they send the verification email and credit my entire purchase and not half of it. Looks like it could be a great app but right now I'm not impressed.
Not a ton of local, close-by places that are in the Dosh cash-back circle, but connecting your cards and getting cash back at places that DO participate is super easy.
I haven't had any problems since the update, however I do not like having to wait 30 days for cash back on hotel bookings.
I have a new phone number and i cant even log into the same account with my email .. This is frustrating

comments: I really do like playing this. I don't expect to get rich but it passes the time. But I can not figure out how to turn the music off, there is not a settings option inside the app. When I'm at work I'd like to be able to turn the game music/sounds off so I can play my own music on my phone while I play this. Adjust this and I'll glafly change to 5 stars!!

Just warming up. Ok . . .now that I'm warmed . . . .the game still sucks. After the first obsticle, the barriers go all the way across the track. There is no way to get past. And it doesn't seem that you can make the vehicle jump. So the only option is to wreck. And that is not fun ! ! !

I'm using the solitaire game and when I've tried to add this game and a couple of other games it says my email address doesn't exist so I sent a couple of emails. I decided to try from scratch since it doesn't recognize my email and it came up with a message saying that email account is already used (yah, it's me)... This is very frustrating!

I'm early in the stages of earning any cash, but so far this app works great. First, it's free Anyone wishing to complain should re-evaluate the something for nothing rule. Actually we are getting something for nothing. Many games to choose from so even the pickiest person is satisfied. Easy to catch on, no major glitches, fun to play. Five stars in my book!

Pretty fun games. I love the concept of having the chance to earn money while just playing generally really fun games. I only actually got this app because I saw it on dragons den and I'm pretty skeptical about these kinds of apps but since they got a deal there, I trust that this app is not a scam

title: Expense IQ Money Manager
description:
Expense IQ (formerly EasyMoney) is your ultimate money manager app that combines an expense tracker, a budget planner, a checkbook register, integrated bills reminder and more rolled into one powerful personal finance app!

The only money manager that grows with you!

As Featured:
‚òÖ Google Play: "New Year New You", "Golden Egg Lunar New Year 2017" Collections
‚òÖ Android Police: "If you're looking for a good financial tool, Expense IQ should definitely be on your list of apps to check out."
‚òÖ Android Authority: "Polished budget app that has Material Design and gives you a lot of information."
‚òÖ Tom's Guide: Best Budgeting and Personal Finance Apps
‚òÖ hvg.hu: "Got your salary? Track with a great expense app!"

Find out why Expense IQ is trusted by hundreds of thousands of users:

Bring your finances together
‚ñ∂„ÄÄKnow where EVERY cent of your money goes. 
‚ñ∂„ÄÄTrack your daily expenses quickly and easily! Takes only seconds to enter your personal or business expenses.
‚ñ∂„ÄÄRepeating transactions: save the hassle of entering your bills every time!
‚ñ∂„ÄÄThe more you use, the more convenient and quicker it gets! Smart predictive engine helps fill in transaction details so you can add records in just 2 taps!
‚ñ∂„ÄÄAttach photos/images to each transaction!
‚ñ∂„ÄÄCreate Projects to group related expenses like travelling or occasions

Stay out of debts for life with effective budget planning
Spend less, save more by keeping to your budgets easily. Set monthly budgets to accounts categories and check at one glance from the color-coded health bars. Get warnings when you overspend/exceed your budget!

Never pay late fees again with timely bill reminders
Remember to pay all your bills with reminders. Optionally, take a photo of your bills/invoices to keep records.

Clear in-depth reports
Analyze your spending pattern with rich, detailed & fully customizable reports. 12+ reports and charts including: Expenses by Category, Monthly Cash Flow, Income vs Expense, Daily/Monthly Expense & more...

Easy-to-use advanced features
‚ñ∂„ÄÄSplit transactions with transfers for multi-categories in one transaction like when shopping at supermarkets (Eg Walmart)
‚ñ∂„ÄÄConvenient and intuitive design - get things done quickly
‚ñ∂„ÄÄSecure Cloud Sync and backup across your devices, or share an account with family
‚ñ∂„ÄÄAdd favorite transactions card to add frequent items
‚ñ∂„ÄÄWidgets to be on top of your finances any time

descriptionHTML:
Expense IQ (formerly EasyMoney) is your ultimate money manager app that combines an expense tracker, a budget planner, a checkbook register, integrated bills reminder and more rolled into one powerful personal finance app!

The only money manager that grows with you!

As Featured:
‚òÖ Google Play: "New Year New You", "Golden Egg Lunar New Year 2017" Collections
‚òÖ Android Police: "If you're looking for a good financial tool, Expense IQ should definitely be on your list of apps to check out."
‚òÖ Android Authority: "Polished budget app that has Material Design and gives you a lot of information."
‚òÖ Tom's Guide: Best Budgeting and Personal Finance Apps
‚òÖ hvg.hu: "Got your salary? Track with a great expense app!"

Find out why Expense IQ is trusted by hundreds of thousands of users:

Bring your finances together
‚ñ∂„ÄÄKnow where EVERY cent of your money goes.
‚ñ∂„ÄÄTrack your daily expenses quickly and easily! Takes only seconds to enter your personal or business expenses.
‚ñ∂„ÄÄRepeating transactions: save the hassle of entering your bills every time!
‚ñ∂„ÄÄThe more you use, the more convenient and quicker it gets! Smart predictive engine helps fill in transaction details so you can add records in just 2 taps!
‚ñ∂„ÄÄAttach photos/images to each transaction!
‚ñ∂„ÄÄCreate Projects to group related expenses like travelling or occasions

Stay out of debts for life with effective budget planning
Spend less, save more by keeping to your budgets easily. Set monthly budgets to accounts categories and check at one glance from the color-coded health bars. Get warnings when you overspend/exceed your budget!

Never pay late fees again with timely bill reminders
Remember to pay all your bills with reminders. Optionally, take a photo of your bills/invoices to keep records.

Clear in-depth reports
Analyze your spending pattern with rich, detailed & fully customizable reports. 12+ reports and charts including: Expenses by Category, Monthly Cash Flow, Income vs Expense, Daily/Monthly Expense & more...

Easy-to-use advanced features
‚ñ∂„ÄÄSplit transactions with transfers for multi-categories in one transaction like when shopping at supermarkets (Eg Walmart)
‚ñ∂„ÄÄConvenient and intuitive design - get things done quickly

comments: Great app, but my reporting period is 25th to 25th, so month by month doesn't help me. I need to report, especially budget wise, from the 25th to the 25th. I'm sure a lot of users might have similar "non standard" reporting periods. Can you guys maybe look at incorporating this as far as budgets are concerned? For example, the majority of my expenses for February will take place from the 26th to the 31st January, but they're allocated to January which skews the reporting.

Bought the lifetime membership and been using it for about 4 years. Their backend service is great as I encountered some hiccups when I switch my phone cos I backup the data with the older version. They are very helpful to send me the file of the previous version in order for me to retrieve my backup data and update the data to the latest version without me losing any of my past data. Keep up the great work! Thanks.

The devs are absent. Been waiting a couple of months for an email I've sent and no answer whatsoever, communication is something I find essential especially for an app that you pay a subscription (or buy the lifetime version since it has the option). The app is good, not great, and definitely not bad, but there are some things that they should work on. And if there is no communication from them it's safe to assume they just moved on and they will no longer respond or will make any mayor updates

The best budget app ever in the app store üëåüëç. I found a bit unprofessionalism from the developer. They simply disregard of your expectation from the app. I had the request of adding option of choosing any photo from gallery to be set as custom icon. They simply reject to be satisfied with the built in icons. Another request was to make any account to be excluded from total (there surely has the option but not working actually) so that I might use my office account in parallel but in vain.

The app is beautiful but only in English. With arabic usage, I can't be able to add data as a new entry or new expense. I hope to develop the application in Arabic like the other languages that work in the application correctly.

title: Moneyhero - Save Money & Personal Finances
description:
The hero of your personal finances! Moneyhero is the app that controls your personal economy in a different way. 

Moneyhero lets you know what you spend each day so as not to miss the savings goal that you have set, in addition, Moneyhero shows you your daily progress according to the limit you have set and tells you if you make ends meet or not. If you are looking for an app to save easily, manage costs and revenues and take control of your personal finances, download Moneyhero.

Moneyhero is an ideal app to manage your money, its operation is very simple, just indicate your main monthly income, your fixed expenses and  mark a saving target, from this, you will know the money you have left to spend (we call it variable), this variable is the one that we will monitor so that you do not pass and meet your saving objective. 

You will be surprised how easy it is to get to save at the end of the month knowing what you can spend at any time.

Free trial for 10 days, then you can continue in the free Lite version or Premium version.

summary: The most easier Personal Finance App. Daily Budget. Income and Expenses tracking
recentChanges: Performance improvements and bug fixes
comments: Is there a way to synchronize data between devices? I have 2 android devices I want to able to enter expenses in both and haven them sync
Tested all money managers, like this the most. Simply perfect for me. They can add some separate saving account as indipendent and visible, but even if they don't I just love this app.

This not linked to the bank account, so everything is manually inputted but I felt more secure. I can see exactly where my money went and how much I have left. Then my free trial expired, and there is a limit (seemingly approx 30) on the number of transactions that can be logged. The main feature that makes this app work for me was where does my money go (seemingly coffee!), however this is only available in the paid for version (¬£22 a year or ¬£3 odd a month at time of review). üòä

The best help to reach your saving goal. It calculates automatically how much money you can use daily or weekly to reach your saving goal. I deleted all other expense apps and saving apps. This is like all in one. Love it.
Love it easy to use whish i could save more

title: Saving Made Simple - Money App
description:
We combined a simple savings calculator with an easy expense tracker to make saving money for anything a breeze! You don't need to know how to budget, just enter a savings plan (such as "Saving for Wedding") and our savings calculator will automatically track your goal and show you exactly how much money you need to save!


**ON SALE** Looking for the Ad-free and Dropbox supported Donate Version? It's on sale for 0.99! Get it now here: http://goo.gl/LPwys

How to Save Money in Just 4 Steps!
1. Create a savings plan, for example "Saving for College Fund".
2. Record payments that add to your savings for your College Fund. 
3. Track expenses which decrease your savings toward your College Fund.
4. Adjust your spending to maximize your money saving and minimize your student debt.

How Does it Make Saving Money Simple?
1. Automatic savings reminders show you exactly how much money you need to save.
2. Savings plans are split into daily, weekly, bi-weekly and monthly required amounts.
3. Automatically record and track expenses and payments by setting scheduled transactions!
4. Create savings plan widgets you put on your homescreen for 1-click access to your goals.
5. Graphs your expenses and shows you exactly where you're spending too much money! Think of it as a personal money manager!

Money Management and Other Features
‚Ä¢ Create savings plans in over 65 currencies to track any savings account.
‚Ä¢ Quick overview of all savings plans shows you exactly how much money you need to save in total.
‚Ä¢ 30 Day expense trend graph shows you how much money you're spending at a glance.
‚Ä¢ Pie charts break down your expense history showing you exactly how you've spent your money.
‚Ä¢ Deadline notifications alert you before a goal's deadline is up.
‚Ä¢ Backup your savings plans to Dropbox and import them to any device!
‚Ä¢ App lock keeps your personal financial information and savings plans safe from prying eyes!

Save Money the Safe Way
Your privacy is safe, Saving Made Simple does not require any personal financial information whatsoever. Our app requires no bank account information nor any connections to your savings account or financial institution.

Rest assured, if your phone is lost or stolen your financial accounts will not be at risk!

Never worry about your personal finances again! Download the #1 personal finance and money saving app on Android now!

comments: It makes it easy to visualize. And it doesnt connect to a bank so I feel safe using it!

This is a great app, it really helps me to track how well I am saving towards my goals. There are two things I would ask, one is to be able to change the goal order as when I choose that option I get a white screen. The other is that I would love it if you could display somewhere the amount left to go.

This is the best app I've found to allocate my money outside of my banking apps. Really useful, sends reminders and calculates how much is needed to be saved per day, week, fortnight or month to meet your goals in the time you set. Wonderful app, would highly recommend!

IM JUST A FIRST TIME USER OF THIS APP. I DO WRITE NOTES ABOUT BUDGETING AND TRACKING THE MONEY FOR EXPENSES, ON WHAT'S HAPPENING, HOW CAN WE SAVE, BUY AND ETC. SO I JUST SAW THIS APP AND TRIED IT. I HOPE THIS WILL BE A GOOD APP FOR WHAT I REALLY NEED, AND I AM ALREADY GIVING IT A 5 STARS AT FIRST USE BECAUSE I'M HAPPY THAT THERE IS AN APP LIKE THIS. GOD BLESS YOU ALL.
Love the professional look and the fact that I can track while saving

title: Money Tree City - Millionaire Town Builder
description:
WHO WANTS TO BE A MILLIONAIRE? Better yet: a TREELLIONAIRE! Money Tree City allows you to build your own city with the aid of the most sought-after legend known to mankind: the money tree. Just tap it and see your riches expand! 

It‚Äôs TAPLICIOUS! Join the world of the mega-wealthy today and be the tycoon of your own celebrity-filled city! Why bother having estates when you can own a whole city? Now, talk about abundance!

Become an entrepreneur ‚Äì build bistros and a myriad of restaurants and cafes, movie theaters, fancy stores, banks, casinos, nightclubs and all the finer things in life that are so appreciated by the rich and famous! Decorate your diamond-studded city and add landmarks to it!  Keep your city growing by investing in your venues and remember: money attracts money and LET IT BLING!

Now that you‚Äôre wealthy, PARTY HARD like the rest of ‚Äòem! Vegas-style fun awaits for you with the casino, where you can play pachinko and the slots machines. Play HARD and win BIG!

HIGHLIGHTS
‚Ä¢ An unique blend of clicker and builder game
‚Ä¢ Create a city that‚Äôd make Monaco and Montecarlo look like the dodgy part of town
‚Ä¢ Customize and decorate your city with all the BLING money can buy
‚Ä¢ Build special buildings with amazing minigames! The wealthy need their fun too!
‚Ä¢ Monitor your tree (and bank account) growth! Your city will expand and so will your profits!
‚Ä¢ Enjoy a mix between neoliberal capitalism and Chinese myth at its best

Download Money Tree City now and enjoy all the things money can buy ‚Äì FOR FREE!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

title: Supermarket Cashier Simulator - Money Game
description:
FEATURES
‚¶Å Be fast with your calculator skills and money math skills. 
‚¶Å Enter the prices or scan the barcodes of the groceries into the cash register. 
‚¶Å Count the number of grocery items.
‚¶Å Add customer payment and give right amount of change.
‚¶Å Tap or insert credit card.
‚¶Å Manage time as customers shopping will get impatient if you take too long.
‚¶Å A combination of cooking mom and brain game.

Use this game for your first job training or just exercise your brain to get fast at math and with time management. Calculate the change and make that grocery money. See if you can finish all the levels of Supermarket Cashier. This game is challenging for both kids and adults.

You can play in Timed Mode where you challenge your brain and time management to complete the levels. Or you can play in Untimed Mode so you can play in a leisurely manner with rhythm and flow. Choose from USD ($), British Pounds(¬£), or Canadian Dollars (C$) to challenge your brain even more. This is the most realistic cash register game on the market.

Recommended for ages 7 and up.

title: Zelle
description:
Zelle¬Æ has partnered with leading banks and credit unions across the U.S. to bring you a fast, safe and easy way to send money to friends and family. Money moves quickly - directly from bank account to bank account. If your bank or credit union offers Zelle, you already have it in your mobile banking app or online banking ‚Äì if they don‚Äôt, the Zelle app will make it easy for you to send money to enrolled Zelle users that already have access through their financial institution.

Zelle. This is how money moves¬Æ.

Using just your recipient‚Äôs email address or U.S. mobile number, you can settle up simply and safely with almost anyone you know and trust. Even better, Zelle does not charge any fees to use the service. (Mobile carrier or bank fees may apply).

GET STARTED:
1.	Download the Zelle app.
2.	Enroll using a Visa¬Æ or Mastercard¬Æ debit card linked to a U.S. checking account; or 
3.	Enroll your U.S. checking account by using your online banking username and password, if your bank supports this feature*.
4.	Choose a person to pay, or request money from, by entering their U.S. mobile number or email address.
5.	Confirm the amount and hit send. If they‚Äôre already enrolled with Zelle, they‚Äôll typically get the money in minutes. If they aren‚Äôt, they will be notified and can follow a few simple steps to complete the payment. 

*Some banks allow customers to enroll in the Zelle app using their online or mobile banking username and password.

Zelle and the Zelle related marks and logos are property of Early Warning Services, LLC

You must have a bank account in the U.S. to use Zelle.

comments: It hardly works for me when I'm trying to send to family and friends that I have had download zelle and sign up. And it also puts a limit on how much I can send to people. It is really annoying having my family download it and sign up and it not allow me to send or receive money from them.

Got an email notice from a friend trying to send me money. To accept, I had to enter my bank. My bank is not listed, so it defaults and tells you to open the app. Unfortunately, the transaction isn' queued up in the app, so you have to request funds from the same person. Now's there's two requests outstanding and no one is getting paid. Zelle needs to close this gap and fix this hole.

I've used this for a long time with no trouble and recently someone sent me money and it says I have to accept it. If I click on the link they have my bank in the list but an error pops up everytime. If I use the app they don't even have my bank and if I enter in my information an error pops up again. The one time I was able to get my account I didn't have any pending activity and can't accept the money.

Downloaded Zell which then told me my banking app offers Zell (Capital One). An associate sent money via Zell to me. I cannot retrieve the money. The money is stuck in limbo. Both mine, and my associates bank accounts were locked while trying to deal with this app. This is easily, the most ridiculous way to try to send and receive money that I've ever heard of. Would absolutely not recommend this app.

JUST DONT DO IT. FIND A BETTER APP. I couldn't get into the app and it said no internet connection. My internet was just fine and all other apps worked. I called customer service and they argued with me that there must be something wrong with my connection then after a few rounds of telling them my connection was fine they said they can't help me. I would never ever use this app to conduct business.

title: Falling Money 3D Live Wallpaper
description:
What did you think, when you hear the rustle of paper? Documents, financial statements, bookkeeping... Or, maybe, autumn leaves falling, with slowly swirling and sparkling of golden crispy leaves... Imagine a different view: these sheets have a price :) And fly straight to your desktop, covered with gold coins! Money? A lot of it!!! Nothing so charmed as a freedom to have them! 
Install this live wallpaper in order to attract them more! 
Do you want money? Take them, they are flying into your hands! 

Does your friends know about which price has rustling your paper?

Share with your friends and buy the full version, which supports dollars, euros and rubles.
From December 27 to January 3 is New Year's SALE! Manage to get this application with additional features!

title: Bluecoins Finance: Budget, Money & Expense Manager
description:
Bluecoins is an incredibly simple finance app that is an excellent expense tracker, budget and money manager tool. It is the complete reporting and analysis app to manage money, expenses, income and budget. Use it for  personal finance, as family budget planner, or for small business! Generate reports of monthly expenses, manage family budget with your spouse, or export finance records into spreadsheets/pdf! It is easy and be amaze at how you can be a finance and budget expert in no time. Take control of your money right now!

Want to have peace of mind and make your money work for you? ‚Äì DOWNLOAD NOW!

What makes us the best budget and finance app today?

"minimalist and efficient, with seamless syncing of data across devices. It helps users keep track of credit cards, bank accounts, loans, and debts through graph reports, and allows for customizable budgeting categories that can be viewed per week, month, quarter, and year, among others."
-CNN, July 2018

üòâ Finance and budget made easy : don't get lost managing finance. Reconciling accounts with bank records and credit card statements is a breeze. Track transactions conveniently via bank notifications or SMS! You don‚Äôt have to be an accountant to use good money principles- you'll good at it while using this excellent finance app!

üë©üèª‚Äçüè´ Meaningful reports : easy to understand reports and charts that you easily generate within the app. All finance reports of your money, budget, expenses, income and more can be readily exported in pdf, excel, html. Send  reports directly to a printer for printing! The reporting feature of this money app is the best of its class!

üë®‚Äçüë®‚Äçüëß Manage your money everywhere : access data on multiple devices and with family members- securely! Anyone you share data with can enter their expenses or incomes on their device. Use Google Drive or Dropbox to synchronize and jointly track money, budget and finance. And with excellent multi-currency feature , manage your money, anytime, anywhere!

Bluecoins finance and budget is Google Editor‚Äôs Choice in 2018

Other key features : Password/fingerprint security, QIF/CSV import, bill reminders, cash flow & net worth analysis, cryptocurrencies support, future finance/expense/income projections, money currency exchange, multi-language support, multiple themes support- including AMOLED dark themes.

Permissions : all permissions will require user authorization and is detailed at our Privacy Policy link available in the Developer contact information.

Any feedback or concerns? Please email us at support@bluecoinsapp.com and we will be happy to assist.

Really like this app. It obviously takes more effort than automatic apps linked to your bank account. On the other hand, it's the most secure method second to using excel/physical paper. I have my phone set that if I double tap and swipe it opens toned a new transaction there and then, so I can take a picture of a receipt and enter the transaction as soon as it happens. Could use an interest festure for investment accounts and category icons should be coloured differently

Amazing app with excellent customizability. Normally can't get used to budget apps because I keep feeling like I can't enter transactions like I want to, however, that is absolutely not the case here. I haven't tried the pro version, but I don't feel like it's necessary either because you are given basically everything in the free version already.

title: Zirtue: Lend & Borrow Money With Friends & Family
description:
Zirtue is a relationship-based lending application that simplifies loans between friends, family and trusted relationships with automatic ACH loan payments.

We get it. You need to loan money to friends and family with confidence. Zirtue allows you to get paid back with automatic monthly (ACH) loan payments from the Borrowers bank account to your bank account. Zirtue automates and simplifies the repayment process, so you can focus on your relationships.

We've all either loaned to or borrowed money from our friends and family with reasonable expectations that everything will go smooth. The reality is usually something different, unexpected or just awkward.  

YOUR FRIENDS | YOUR FAMILY | YOUR LOAN | AUTOMATIC MONTHLY PAYMENTS

LEND & BORROW MONEY
Within minutes you can lend or borrow money with friends and family on your terms.

- Borrow money from friends and family
- Loan money to friends and family
- Digital agreement on loan terms
- Automatic monthly loan payments
- Payment notifications and reminders
- Personal Dashboard to track your loans


RELATIONSHIP BASED LENDING
Zirtue is a private secure lending app that allows you to leverage your personal relationships instead of your personal credit score to lend and borrow money.

TRACK & MANAGE
Easily track and manage your loan activity using your private dashboard to view all loan activity and message lenders and borrowers.

SIMPLY SAFE & SECURE
Zirtue simplifies loans between friends and family. We're serious about security and use cutting-edge technology to ensure your personal information is fully encrypted and securely stored.

YOU SET THE PERIOD FOR REPAYMENT
3 Months - Minimum Period for Repayment
3 Years - Maximum Period for Repayment
5% - Fixed Annual Percentage Rate (APR)

HERE‚ÄôS AN EXAMPLE
$300 - Loan Amount From Family
$302.50 - Total Cost of Loan
3 Month - Repayment Period

Monthly Payments
1. $100.83 (Includes $1.25 Interest-APR)
2. $100.83 (Includes $0.84 Interest-APR)
3. $100.85 (Includes $0.42 Interest-APR)

recentChanges:
Here‚Äôs what under the hood in this update:

‚Äî Zirtue is 100% FREE for Lenders! Borrowers pay one low subscription cost with unlimited access and no service fees

‚Äî Zirtue partners with Kiva.org to donate $1 per month for each active subscription ‚Äî Let‚Äôs pay it forward!

‚Äî Borrowers can now select a Payback Period between 3 months and 3 years ‚ÄîMore flexibility

‚Äî Added Metadata to highlight Payback Period, Interest Rate (APR) along with an example of Payment Schedule with Total Cost of Loan
comments: I am very pleased with my zirtue experience. The app was simple to use and I could easily manage where I had money coming and going. Would recommend as an easy way track and maintain loan payments between friends and family.
Zirtue was great for me to keep track of my friends paying me back. Super easy to use and took the worry out of getting paid back.
Great response time to any issues that may occur. Overall solid company.
This is an awesome concept. It reduces the awkwardness and makes the process waaaay more systematic.
Brilliant App....for lending and borrowing money...üòäüëç

title: Taps to Riches
description:
Build your empire one city at a time in this new tap idler sure to make you money hungry! Tap to make money, tap to upgrade your city‚Äôs business buildings, and tap some more! Unlock, hire, and collect as many Advisors and Bizbots as you can to upgrade your business value, build your cities faster, and earn a stash of cash as you rise from rags to riches! Valuable Adviser bonuses will have you tapping even faster! Can you become a billionaire business tycoon or will you fail as a capitalist?

From the creators of Coin Dozer and Brick Breaker Hero, Taps to Riches will have you tapping everywhere you go!

- Expand your empire into multiple cities with unique challenges
- Hundreds of hilarious Advisers who add valuable business bonuses! Collect them all!
- Dare to reset your progress and take advantage of Bizbots, a precious resource that give you even more money bonuses per tap!
- Buy and upgrade your businesses to see them evolve into architectural masterpieces!
- Tons of Bonuses and Achievements for you to discover with all of your tapping frenzy!
- More features to come!

Taps to Riches is a unique city building simulation game with tap and click mechanics. Upgrade businesses in game to make money and earn extra cash as you venture into new cities.   

Start from the bottom as a newly freed villain with big dreams of once again achieving world domination. Tap your way into riches and money by upgrading buildings and investing in your city. The more cash you invest in businesses the more money they produce for you. Hire valuable Advisors to unlock special business bonuses, and use Bizbot resources for even more cash bonuses!

Taps to Riches is a free game that is supported by the ads we and others display. To do this, we work with a variety of online advertising partners who collect data from users of our games and other games to show you ads that are relevant to your interests. Do not install or launch our games unless you consent to this use and sharing of data, as further explained in our Privacy Policy (http://gamecircus.com/privacy-policy/).

comments: I really enjoyed the game at first but then progress just halted and I have reoccuring issues with their advertisers. The ads won't run, or won't return to the game, or just crash the game. Since ads are incorporated as part of game play, if they don't work you can't progress in the game. This is where I sit now... As of today I completed one of their promotions to reach level 100 on Stars Slots and found that my rewards and the pending is gone. I was supposed to get 14k keys....

When it is working properly this is a fun game. Unfortunately, it is not working far too often. For example, watching ads is required to play and I don't mind this, but I can't play ads far too often. My game was updated but I did not get the Thanksgiving or Christmas events which really was a huge letdown! And don't bother trying to contact support; they never reply or fix the issues no matter how much you email them. While I enjoy this game, it desperately needs many improvements!

Google play should really give a 0 star option so this game can be properly rated. DO NOT WASTE MONEY ON THIS GAME!!!!!! you are given the option to watch a video to increase your boosts, idle money you made while not playing and for free event chests however this feature only auctually works about 5% of the time. I kept hoping it would get fixed but nothing has been done. I have uninstalled the game and will be contacting google play for a refund on this scam of a game.

I enjoy the game, but it's gotten bad lately with how many times videos wont play, often resulting in a loss of money, gems, or other payout items. I have to close the game and reopen it constantly, and that works about half the time to allow videos to play. And also there have been many ads popping up during business bonuses, and prevent you from taking advantage of the bonus. I'd give more stars if these things werent so prevalent.

Love Taps to Riches . Why aren't AD videos NOT playing for double bonuses? I think it's been almost a week I have been having problems. I thought it was just I but I've noticed others are having the same problem. Can you please fix, I use the videos most of the time. A little compensation would be nice too, especially when theres an event going on, it's unfair. Thank you. I will leave my 5‚òÜ because I do love the game.. please, fix this problem. It's the only tap game I play.

title: Money Box: Savings Goals
description:
With this free money saving app, you can easily save and achieve goals even if you don‚Äôt know how to save money. So, download it and start saving for that retirement, vacation, new car, kids college fees, or a new iPhone!

No matter your paycheck‚Äôs size, this piggy bank helps you to set aside a portion of it. Use this smart piggy bank to bring your financial goals to life!

This app is completely FREE to use, so why not install it now and start saving money?

Here is why as a money saver, you will love our Money Box app:

*MOTIVATIONAL: You can add a photo of your dream house, holiday destination or any other purchase goal and see the progress in a visual way.

*EASY: Our intuitive user interface makes using this money manager easy. That‚Äôs why everyone can use it including the kids!
* REWARDING: It‚Äôs easy to set goals even for 52 weeks, but many people find it difficult to follow through. Money Box guides you from desire to success so you can enjoy the fruits of your money.
* SMART: Money Box takes away the frustration of saving money for a specific goal. It gives you the power and confidence to succeed every time, and that‚Äôs just plain smart!
* EFFECTIVE: By providing you a simple interface and valuable features to organize and manage your saving targets, you‚Äôll love how effective this savings tracker is at helping you save money.
Install this money saving app to start enjoying all these benefits.
=== HOW Money Box WORKS ===
Easily manage your goals from the dashboard:
1. Title
2. Amount and currency
3. Target date
4. Icon/picture
5. Savings account name
6. Planned savings frequency ‚Äì weekly, monthly etc.
7. Reminders
8. Make contributions toward your goals.
REPEAT!
That‚Äôs how to save money with our free Money Box app.
Install it now to enhance your personal finance health. 

==> The World‚Äôs Most Effective Purchasing Goal App <==

Money Box has quickly become a favorite money saving app among ambitious and determined savers eager to take control of their spending goals. It is generating a major buzz on social media and its diverse fans are spreading across the globe. You could even introduce your kids to it and start teaching them how to save money. If you like to challenge yourself with a 52 weeks savings plan, go ahead and install the Money Box app and start saving.

** Money Box IS THE BEST Savings Tracker** 
Maybe you want to buy a boat or pay off bills, take a vacation or just get that pair of sunglasses that you‚Äôve had your eye on ‚Äì Money Box is secure and flexible enough to accommodate your savings goals big and small! This ease-of-use and focused flexibility is a huge difference between Money Box and other apps for saving money.
===FEATURES ===
‚Ä¢	Intuitive, sleek interface
‚Ä¢	Feature-rich & Easy to use.
‚Ä¢	Secure encrypted data.
‚Ä¢	This savings tracker has multiple currency options.
‚Ä¢	Progress & Goal notifications and reminders. 
‚Ä¢	Share your success on Twitter and Facebook.
‚Ä¢	Ad free version upgrade.
‚Ä¢	Optimization for all the latest mobile devices.
‚Ä¢	Updates to ensure flawless use and new bonus features.

Also check out Money Box Pro for more than 2 active goals management and more features. 

Feel free to drop us a line! We‚Äôre always listening to your suggestions to improve Money Box. If you have any issues with this piggy bank, just contact us and we will help you!

** Are you loving our app? We‚Äôd love to hear about it! Please take a moment to leave us a nice review. It really helps! **
Also, like us on Facebook so you learn more on how to save money. 
We appreciate your support greatly! You inspire us to make more great apps like Money Box.

summary:
Save money monthly or 52 weeks with this free saving app. Set and
achieve goals.
comments: Excellent app. Since I have always struggled with savings, I found their feature very helpful where it lets you add a picture of your savings goal. Having the visual part made it so much easier for me to save compared with many other methods I have tried that don't offer this feature.

Quite good. Better than other apps. I like that I can add my own pictures to the goals helps keep me motivated. Would be nice if I could see overall statistics for all my goals like the total amount I need to save up for all my goals combined, weekly and monthly would be nice. But it's a good-ish app. Can be better though.

I was trying to decide between this and a similar app. I get that this is a free, try-before-you-buy version but I was hit with two full video ads within three screens. That's overkill and doesn't really make want to sit through however many more just to feel the app out.

If you implement the possibility to group or order by saving account I'll give you five stars, that's all I'm missing (even as a Pro only feature is fine, I already bought it). Everything else is great. EDIT: I noticed the sort order doesn't get saved and I have to sort every time. Slightly frustrating.

Everythings pretty good except you cannot reorganise your goals except for alphabetically or due date. I would rate this 5 stars if you can reorganise goals by "drag and move" and not be limited to the two above options. Thanks

title: Borrow Money üí∞ Online Payday Loans üíµ
description:
Why Choose Borrow Money?

You get more with our Cash Advance App - Cheaper loans tailored to your credit profile and history

5 minute application - The experience is simple, online and quick

Money straight to your bank - Anytime, anywhere in as little as 5 minutes

We get it, and you - A new generation of credit for millennials, by millennials


Borrow cash fast!

Our Loan App offers an easy and reliable way to borrow cash fast when you‚Äôd like a little extra. We offer small loans of up to $15,000, approved online. There are no hidden fees, long wait times or other hassles. By borrowing the cash you need, you can stay on top of your budget and keep your finances healthy.

Our online loan services will ensure you have access to a fast cash advance when you need it. You can apply in just 3 minutes and receive a quick decision. Approved funds can be in your bank account in 60 minutes or less, depending on your bank of course! Please note that if you apply to borrow money outside of business hours, it will generally take longer.
No hidden fees and easy repayments

Borrow money with peace of mind today. No hidden transaction fees.

Our loans range from $200 - $15,000 and the cost of borrowing will vary depending on your loan rating, loan amount and term. Go to the cost page to find out what your cost of borrowing may be.

Once approved, we'll set you up with a repayment schedule for your cash advance loan, aligned with your pay cycle. If you develop a good credit history with us, you may be able to borrow larger amounts in future, depending on your financial situation. If you have any trouble repaying your loan, get in touch with us via phone, email, live chat, Facebook or Twitter and we may be able to help.

Secure digital borrowing

So we can approve your loan fast, we use super secure technology to access your last 90 days of bank statements in seconds. So don‚Äôt worry about sending us loads of documents and payslips!  

When it‚Äôs so quick and easy, why wait? Apply now to borrow money today.

Life is full of surprises, and sometimes you need to borrow money just to get by. Maybe you‚Äôve started a new job and you have to wait for your first paycheck, or you got a flat tire on the way to work, or your refrigerator broke and you need to buy a new one. These things happen all the time, and they can be difficult to cover if you aren‚Äôt prepared.

Getting cash when you have an unexpected expense and need money quickly can be a challenge, especially if you aren‚Äôt prepared. The answer for many people is to borrow money.

However, if you have bad credit, don‚Äôt have a standing relationship with a lender, or don‚Äôt have any assets you can use for collateral, you may not qualify for a traditional personal loan from a large national bank. This means you may need to explore alternate options to get the help you need.

comments: It's okay. Not all that. You can gain tickets pretty easily but don't expect any cash. Would take you forever. Even with a ton of tickets. For some reason the sliding part to connect the letters seems a little difficult. I can slid quite easily on other games to connect the letters. But not this one. Takes several attempts.

You need to work on the "stretch" of the android screen. When first installed the perspective is not accurate for the game to be played easily, but the rest of the graphics and animations are interesting and draw you into the game. I have enjoyed the challenge, so far!

Fun little game, however the input is horrible. Spell the same 3 letter word 4 times and it still wont accept it (ARM was the word). Hit detection for each letter needs improvement. Maybe have alternate input by tapping each letter.

It would of been nice but for some reason I cannot use email to sign in for this app. I was signing in using email but it tells me email is not valid and it says if I have entered a correct email. Can u guys kindly tell me why I can't use or register on my email..tnx

On each level the game has problem with the letters- it takes at least 5 seconds to make the first letter of the word to work . And when have a limited time it makes you nervous ! So I am uninstalling it .

title: Sharemoney Money Transfers
description:
It's the best way to send money from the US to Mexico, the Philippines, Vietnam, Brazil, Nigeria, Colombia, Peru, Guatemala, Honduras, Ecuador, Costa Rica, and many other countries across the globe, at the best exchange rates.

This free money transfer app can give you everything you need to transfer funds within minutes to friends and loved ones. When sending money online to your destination country, we'll keep the process painless. Our app gives our customers an even more convenient way to transfer money from the US.


Using the Sharemoney app, you can:

- Send money to Mexico, the Philippines, Brazil, Vietnam, Nigeria, Argentina, Bolivia, Chile, Costa Rica, Ecuador, Honduras, Nigeria, Peru, Paraguay, El Salvador, Burkina Faso, Colombia, Dominican Republic, Guatemala, Panama, Senegal and Uruguay from the US within minutes
- Maintain security in every transaction
- Track your money transfer every step of the way
- Pay little to no fees, with winning exchange rates for every transfer

Transfer Money Online to the Philippines, South America, Africa and Many Other Nations

- Get access to many of the most reputable banks in Central American, South American and other countries
- Depending on the recipient's country, you can choose to send money via direct bank deposit, cash pickup, or in some cases home delivery!
- Avoid bank fees and other unnecessary costs with fast and easy debit card transactions

Why Sharemoney should be your choice when sending money to your loved ones:

- Lower Fees and the Best Exchange Rates
- Only get the best exchange rates
- Use a debit card for quick and simple transfers that don't result in extra costs
- Compare our prices with others
- Send USD to countries that accept it at no extra charge

Track Transfers from Beginning to End
- Receive notification when your transfer is processed, when it becomes available to your recipient, and as soon as your recipient retrieves your funds

Fast and Easy Money Transfers
- Install the app in mere minutes and transfer funds immediately
- Quickly repeat transactions
- Under 24 hours for most deliveries
- 100% money-back guarantee

Secure Money Transfers
- We work hard to maintain security throughout every transfer
- We only work with the largest and most trusted banks, as a money transfer service of Omnex Group
- Sharemoney is federally and state regulated, with Extended Validation SSL security behind every transaction

Consistent Customer Support
- Get 24/7 multilingual customer support
- Contact us at any time via our toll-free number using the app

Visit TrustPilot for customer reviews!

title: Money Race Finance and Investing Game
description:
Ever wanted to build wealth and earn money like rich people do, having a constant income and cashflow so you can enjoy the desired financial freedom?

Play Money Race 2, the money game that shows you how to do this all by yourself. Money Race 2 teaches investments and money management for everyone. Learn how you can stop working for money, and instead, make your money work for you and earn more money!

With Money Race you will learn the sound financial principles in acquiring and keeping wealth, and most importantly, making your money grow by itself.

Take your finances and money management to the next level: take investment decisions and get into multiple business opportunities. Acquire and build businesses and real estate, make money on the stocks market, get debts that will make you earn more money, increase your cashflow and build passive income.

Money Race 2 will guide you across different levels of financial status: from the very bottom with your pockets almost empty, up to build empires of business and corporations, owning everything you ever wanted to have.

Each level has the same goal: increasing your cash flow and making your passive income exceed your expenses and therefore achieving the desired financial freedom. And if you want to become a real financial guru, try to get all the financial achievements that are waiting for you on the game. 

Throughout the game, Money Race 2 will show you tips, tricks, recommendations and common mistakes about money, personal finances and investments, helping you to be financially free and live a rich life with your money and finance under control.

You will be able to prove the financial skills you have acquired over the game playing against other players in multiplayer games and you can even invite and challenge your Facebook friends and show them how you become a tycoon step by step.

Money Race have been considered one of the best money games for financial education by thousands of players. Play now and improve your finances with Money Race 2, the new version of the acclaimed financial and money game Money Race, featuring a large list of improvements and new features.

comments: Generally a positive experience; the game is interesting, but the stock market seems bugged. When buying the same stock at different price points, the game doesn't bundle the stocks together with an adjusted average price per stock, but lists them as separate assets. When I try to sell off my "different" stocks, the game refuses to make the sale - not even sales of a single stock go through.

The game can be addictive and fun. However I do not like that it makes life decisions for you on spins like having kids and marriage and shortly after you get married you are divorced and they get a nice amount of money also it is bogus how landing on the gift icon takes more money than giving you rewards and it lands on charity alot and never lands on the most important icon the briefcase and when it does you boss is laying you off and or not happy with your performance.
Great learning games, unfortunately keep bugging, always get back to race game display on every spin and every selection. Please fix the bug for smoother experience
Great app! I think adding an option to switch currencies will make the experience more immersive.
Would of rated it 5 stars but iv noticed a few glitches in the game. Besides that it's a great game!

title: Spending Tracker
description:
Spending Tracker is the easiest and most user friendly expense manager app in the store. The simple fact is, by tracking your spending you will be able to stick to a budget and therefore SAVE MONEY. So download it for free, enter your expenses and income, and have instant control over your spending!

‚òÖ Features ‚òÖ 
---------------
‚úî Simple and intuitive user interface 
- helps you to easily manage your spending
- super fast expense entry

‚úî Flexible Time Periods 
- choose to track Weekly, Monthly or Yearly 

‚úî Budget Mode 
- optionally set a fixed budget amount to help you meet your spending targets 
- carry over any remaining budget to the next month or week 

‚úî Summary View 
- overview of your current balance along with expense and income totals
- see your main areas of spending

‚úî Log Expense and Income 
- repeat transactions daily, weekly or monthly
- export to CSV for use in a spreadsheet
- export to PDF for viewing and printing (Pro Upgrade required)

‚úî Multiple Accounts
- create separate personal, business and savings accounts for example

‚úî Reports 
- beautiful and interactive charts allow easy visualisation of where your money goes
- view spending grouped by category 
- see your history so you can track your progress

‚úî Categories 
- editable expense and income categories 
- choose a quality icon for each category

‚úî Syncing (Pro Upgrade required)
- automatically sync your data to other Android devices
- you can also sync to iOS and Windows versions of Spending Tracker, which will require a separate upgrade on these platforms

‚úî Backups
- keep your data safe by backing up to Dropbox
- the auto backups feature will take care of it for you

‚úî Widget
- put the widget on your home screen for easy access
- quick add buttons

‚úî Local Tips
- optionally receive tips when you enter participating local venues (requires location and bluetooth permissions)
- this could include money saving offers

‚úî Special design layout for tablets
- optimal use of larger screen size makes it even better for managing your money

recentChanges:
Version 2.3.1 of Spending Tracker
============================
* Startup performance improvement
* Spending can now be tracked on a 'Daily' basis
* Many new category icons have been added, and icons are now organised into groups
* Choose whether to show 'Outline' or 'Filled' icons under 'Settings -> Category Icon Style'

comments: great way of tracking what you spend!!

LOVE this app, I paid for the full version within 24 hours as it's so useful, I love the way you can configure icons and categories exactly to what you use small things like cute little icons for each category keep me interested! I enjoy roll over budgets and detail each spend, it's helped me so much to arrest over spending as I put everything in instantly.

Easy to use and gets the job done. Which is good. However i don't like the idea of everything that happened in 2019 and before to become irrelevant because of their yearly/monthly filters. Would be nice if we can view "last 6 months" or last year. To include data from previous months. Also we can only filter one category at a time, which seems an easy fix. Would be nice if we can filter 2 or more categories for a comparison. Etc

Awesome so far. I'm finally getting all my finances in order. While it's amazing what you spend If you keep track it. So far very few ads and the app is running perfectly not a single hitch. So after one month I am deeply impressed. I never a take the time to read an app.. This time I am making an exception. Good job.

It does what it says - it helps me track my spending. Easy to use. Functionally useful. MS Money it is not but for day to day tracking and cash flow monitoring it fits my bill. Had a couple of queries early on but received prompt responses which sorted me out. Would recommend it.

title: 52 Weeks Money Challenge
description:
Still trying to keep a running tab on your spending, but end up with no money saved?

Saving doesn‚Äôt need to be hard, you just need to find a way that is most suited to you to make saving both easy and fun. The popular 52 Weeks Money Challenge is actually a great way to save!

What is the 52 Weeks Money Challenge?
For the first week, save $10
From the second week, save $10 more than the previous week
In one year, you will have saved $13,780!

There is no trick to it, just save the relevant amount each week, at the end of one year you will end up with a sizeable sum!

Start your new year with a new goal, get your friends on board and participate in the challenge together! Just set your saving goal and you are on your way to impressive savings at the end of the year!

„Äê5 Major Features „Äë
‚ñ∏ Different challenge modes
Add fun and variety to normal saving plans

‚ñ∏ Customized start date
If you have already started your saving plan, you can still transfer without issues

‚ñ∏ Customized your own saving cycle
Make saving free and flexible

‚ñ∏ Define your own currency
For ones that love to travel,  make saving more goal-oriented 

‚ñ∏ Reminder setting
Keeping you on track and on top of your saving goals 

Set yourself a goal and start saving today!


„ÄêFrom the developer„Äë
Staying up countless late nights to develop this app. 
Please support me with ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ if you are enjoying saving money with this app and share this handy tool with your friends and loved ones.
If you have any questions or recommendations for the app, I would love to hear from you. Contact me on: contact.52weeks@gmail.com

I can customize my currency, set my savings goals, and the frequency of my deposits. The app calculates how much I'll save at the end of the year and how much I'll need to be contributing. It sets up a reminder date to keep reminding me to save. The interface is user-friendly and easy to follow. I love it, 5 Stars üåü

Simple yet an effective app. But can you add an option to have it like a countdown starting from 52 instead? I think sometimes it's better to start with larger amounts while we are full of enthusiasm at the beginning of saving. Thanks!

It works great. Does everything I need. I would like if you uncheck a box on a week you saved it would ask if you really want to uncheck it. I like that I don't have to go in order of weeks I can save $5 one week and the next save $40. My pay fluctuates so if I have more that week I save more. I like that it lets you choose different amounts. It's a great app. Not overly fancy, but does what it needs to do. Has ads, but not a lot. I understand everyone's gotta make some money :)
I paid to get rid of the advertisements, but then you still have to pay a little more to change your background wallpaper, that's pretty $hitty! Only complaint
